GSP29snyayvpu:274: sa nityo 'nityo veti vaktavyam. nityaś ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:275: evaṃ saty ādyasaṃvedanenāiva tasya sāmastyagrahaṇād uttareṣāṃ tadviṣayāṇām adhigatagocaratvenāprāmāṇyaprasaktiḥ. anityaś cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:282: tadviṣayānyajñānānām aprāmāṇyaṃ prasajyeta. tatsānnidhyapakṣe tu dvayor api parasparaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:283: viśakalitarūpatvāt pakṣadvayoditaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ paścāllagnaṃ dhāvati. viśeṣaviśiṣṭasāmānyapakṣe
GSP29snyayvpu:284: punar etad eva viparītaṃ yojyam. tan nānadhigatārthādhigantṛtvaṃ jñānasya kathañcid
GSP29snyayvpu:285: vicārabhāragauravaṃ sahata ity alakṣaṇam iti sthitam. avisaṃvādakatvam adhunā vicāryate:
GSP29snyayvpu:286: tat kiṃ pradarśitārthaprāptyāhosvid prāptiyogyārthopadarśakatvena utāvicalitārthaviṣayatvena bhavān jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ kathayati?
GSP29snyayvpu:293: anucitadeśāvasthānenāiva prāptyanarhatvāt teṣām. atha tṛtīyaḥ pakṣas,
GSP29snyayvpu:298: na hi svaparaprakāśi jñānaṃ bādhārahitaṃ vimucyānyasya viṣayānirākaraṇaṃ jñānāntareṇa
GSP29snyayvpu:299: prekṣāmahe. tat tad eva nyāyāt pramāṇaṃ bhavadbhir abhyupagatam iti. “arthopalabdhihetuḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:300: pramāṇam” ity etad api na parīkṣāṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:301: śarīrāder api tatkāraṇatayā prāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt. avyavahitam arthopalambhakāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:303: evaṃ tarhi jñānam eva svaparāvirbhāvakaṃ nirbādhakaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:305: tadsadbhāve 'py arthaparicchedābhāvāt. tasmād etad eva cāru pramāṇalakṣaṇam iti.

GSP29snyayvpu:310: pratigataṃ pratyakṣaṃ. yad indriyam āśrityojjihīte 'rthasākṣātkāri jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣam
GSP29snyayvpu:312: na tu pravṛttinimittam. sa hy evaṃ vyutpāditaḥ sākṣād grāhyagrāhakaṃ jñānaviśeṣaṃ lakṣayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:314: yathā gamanakriyāyāṃ vyutpādito 'pi gośabdaḥ kakudādimantaṃ piṇḍaviśeṣaṃ gacchantam agacchantaṃ vā gocarayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:317: viparyayād iti. tataś ca sarvajñānānāṃ yat svarūpasaṃvedanaṃ tad api pratyakṣam ity uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:318: tatrāpi svarūpasya grāhyasya sākṣātkaraṇasadbhāvād iti. akṣebhyaḥ parato vartata
GSP29snyayvpu:319: iti parokṣam. akṣavyāpāranirapekṣaṃ manovyāpāreṇāsākṣādarthaparicchedakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:321: [NAV_1.8] caśabdau pratyakṣaparokṣayos tulyakakṣatāṃ lakṣayataḥ. tena yat pare prāhuḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:324: viśadāviśadapratibhāsaviśeṣasya sato 'pi jyeṣṭhatāṃ praty anaṅgatvāt. pratyakṣasya puraḥsaratvāt parokṣasya kaniṣṭhateti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:328: pravartata iti pratyakṣasya jyeṣṭhatvakalpane “paśya mṛgo dhāvatīty“ādiśabdabalāt
GSP29snyayvpu:330: tathā smaraṇāt saṅketagrahaṇād vāpūrvāpūrvārthadarśanakutūhalādinā vanadevakulādigocaraṃ parokṣapūrvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam iti parokṣasya jyeṣṭhatāsajyeta.
GSP29snyayvpu:331: [NAV_1.9] dvidheti. “sarvaṃ vākyaṃ sāvadhāraṇaṃ pravartata” iti nyāyād,
GSP29snyayvpu:333: viparītākāranirākaraṇacāturyāyogena nirākāṅkṣapravṛttyasiddher dvidhāivety avadhāraṇena paraparikalpitaviparītasaṃkhyāntaraṃ tiraskurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:335: [NAV_1.10] tathā hi: pratyakṣam evāikaṃ pramāṇam ity asat,
GSP29snyayvpu:336: parokṣābhāve tasyāiva prāmāṇyāyogāt. sa hi kāścit pratyakṣavyaktīr arthakriyāsamarthārthaprāpakatvenāvyabhicāriṇīr upalabhyānyās tadviparītatayā vyabhicāriṇīś ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:337: tataḥ kālāntare punar api tādṛśetarāṇāṃ pratyakṣavyaktīnāṃ pramāṇatetarate samācakṣīta.
GSP29snyayvpu:340: kṣamate. na cāyaṃ svapratītigocarāṇām api pratyakṣavyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ paraṃ pratipādayitum
GSP29snyayvpu:342: prāmāṇyapratyāyakaṃ paraparipādakaṃ ca parokṣāntargatam anumānarūpaṃ pramāṇāntaram
GSP29snyayvpu:343: urarīkartavyam. parāvabodhārthaṃ ca pratyakṣam evāikaṃ pramāṇaṃ nānyad astīty ullapann
GSP29snyayvpu:346: parokṣasya prāmāṇyaṃ balād āpatatīti nyāyāt. svargādṛṣṭadevatādipratiṣedhaṃ na pratyakṣeṇa kartum arhati,
GSP29snyayvpu:347: tasya sannihitamātraviṣayatvāt. na cāyaṃ tadpratiṣedhena kharakharakacārvākatām āpnoti,
GSP29snyayvpu:348: pramāṇāntaraṃ ca tatpratiṣedhārthaṃ necchatīti viṣamam etat kathaṃ kuryād iti savismayaṃ naś cetaḥ. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:349: pratyakṣam api kathaṃ pramāṇatāṃ svīkarotīti vaktavyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:352: tatabhāve visphāritekṣaṇayugalasyāpi pramātur nodīyata iti yadi brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:359: iti sakalaviśadadarśanāni satyatābhimatāny apy alīkatām aśnuvīran. tan na pramāṇabhūtaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:360: parokṣaṃ kadācana gṛhyamāṇapadārthasattāṃ vihāyotpattum utsahata iti pratyakṣavat
GSP29snyayvpu:362: [NAV_1.11] tathā yad api parair uktadvayātiriktaṃ pramāṇasaṃkhyāntaraṃ pratyajñāyi,
GSP29snyayvpu:363: tatrāpi yat paryālocyamānam upamānārthāpattivat pramāṇatām ātmasātkaroti,
GSP29snyayvpu:364: tad anayor eva pratyakṣaparokṣayor antarbhāvanīyam. yat punar vicāryamāṇaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitābhāvavat prāmāṇyam eva nāskandati,
GSP29snyayvpu:365: na tena bahirbhūtenāntarbhūtena vā kiñcin naḥ prayojanam avastutvād ity apakarṇanīyam.
GSP29snyayvpu:366: [NAV_1.12] atha katham upamānasya prāmāṇyam iti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:367: tad ucyate: prathamaṃ hi viśadadarśanādhigatagopiṇḍaviśeṣasya “yathā gaus tathā gavaya”
GSP29snyayvpu:370: 'nayor vā sādṛśyam iti sādṛśyaviśiṣṭaṃ piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā gocarayat
GSP29snyayvpu:371: saṃvedanam udīyate tad upamānam iti. yathāhus tadvādinaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:372: “tasmād yad dṛśyate tat syāt sādṛśyena viśeṣitaṃ /
GSP29snyayvpu:373: prameyam upamānasya sādṛśyaṃ vā tadanvitam” // NAV_1.12:1 // iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:376: vyavahārakāri sādṛśyam avasyad upamānaṃ svaparaprakāśitayā nirbādhakatvāc ca pramāṇam.
GSP29snyayvpu:377: pūrvāparapiṇḍātiriktam aparaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nopalabhyata iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:378: ko 'yam upalambho yena nopalabhyate sādṛśyaṃ yadi pratyakṣaṃ tat?
GSP29snyayvpu:379: yadi pratyakṣe sādṛśyam upamānagocaratvān na pratibhāti,
GSP29snyayvpu:381: na hi jñānāntare tadgocaro na pratibhātīti nirgocaraṃ tad iti vaktuṃ śakyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:382: itarathopamāne 'pi pratyakṣanirgrāhyā vyaktir na bhātīti nirgocaram adhyakṣam anuṣajyeta.
GSP29snyayvpu:383: tad yathā svaviṣaye 'dhyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ tathopamānam api. na hi dvayoḥ prathamānayor
GSP29snyayvpu:384: ekaṃ prati viśeṣābhāve pakṣapātaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ. etena pratyabhijñājñānasmṛtyūhādīnām
GSP29snyayvpu:389: prabuddhaḥ pūrvārthaviṣayaṃ sa evāyaṃ tajjātīyo vety ullekhena pratyabhijñājñānam utthāpayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:391: asañjātapūrvārthagocaradarśanasya tadudayābhāvāt. tathā sa eva saṃskāras tādṛśārthadarśanenābhogādinā vā prabuddho 'nubhūtaviṣayāsampramoṣalakṣaṇaṃ smaraṇam upajanayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:392: adṛṣṭārthasya puṃsaḥ smaraṇānupapatter iti. ūho 'pi pratyakṣānumānāsaṃvedyasādhyārthānyathānupapannatvalakṣaṇaliṅgasambandhagrahaṇapravaṇaḥ pramāṇāntaram iti kathayiṣyate.
GSP29snyayvpu:394: pāvakāder arthāntaraṃ pūrvadarśanagocarāt samadhikam avyabhicaritaṃ parikalpayantīti
GSP29snyayvpu:396: tallakṣaṇayogāt. evam anyad api pratyakṣagocarādhikyasampādakaṃ nirākāṅkṣatayā vyavahārakāri yad yat saṃvedanaṃ tat tat pramāṇam iti samarthanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:399: 'nyathānupapannārthāntaradarśanadvāreṇa prastutārthasaṃvedanacaturatvād iti. kiñcidviśeṣāt tu pramāṇāntaraparikalpane pramāṇeyattā viśīryetānantyaprāpter,
GSP29snyayvpu:400: āvaraṇakṣayopaśamavicitratayā jñānapravṛtter vicitratvād iti. nanu cāivaṃ sati yat parokṣasya dvaividhyaṃ vakṣyamāṇam anumānaśābdabhedena tad api katham upapatsyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:408: yady api kayācit prakriyayānumāne śābdam antarbhāvayituṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:410: 'tas tasyāhatya prāmāṇyaṃ samarthanīyam. na cāpṛthagbhūtasya tadviviktaṃ vaktuṃ śakyam iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:411: ataḥ pārthakyenopanyāsaḥ. anena cāitad upalakṣayaty anyeṣām api parokṣaviśeṣāṇām
GSP29snyayvpu:412: anumānāntarbhāvasambhave 'pi yaṃ yaṃ prati pareṣāṃ vipratipattis taṃ taṃ parokṣān
GSP29snyayvpu:413: niṣkṛṣya viviktayuktyupanyāsena tasya tasya prāmāṇyam āvedanīyam. tathā ca śāstrāntare
GSP29snyayvpu:414: yad ūhādīnāṃ lakṣaṇam akāry ācāryais tad yuktam evety uktam bhavati.
GSP29snyayvpu:418: ghaṭādir nāstīti” vastuparicchedaprāvīṇyam ābibhrāṇaṃ tadadhikagrāhyārthābhāvāt pramāṇāntaraṃ parikalpyamānaṃ nirasyatīti kiṃ naś cintayā,
GSP29snyayvpu:419: tasya sadasadrūpavastugrāhiṇaḥ pratiprāṇiprasiddhatvāt. atha kadācid abhidadhyād:
GSP29snyayvpu:422: nāstitājñānaṃ tu vastugrahaṇottarakālaṃ pratiyogismaraṇasadbhāve mānasam akṣavyāpāranirapekṣam unmajjati. tad uktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:424: bhāvāṃśenāiva saṃyogo yogyatvād indriyasya hi” // NAV_1.15:1 //
