GSP29snyayvpu:432: ghaṭādyabhāvavinirluṭhitaṃ bhūtalam ādyadarśanena gṛhyata iti ghaṭādayo gṛhyanta iti prāptaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:433: tadabhāvāgrahaṇasya tadbhāvagrahaṇanāntarīyakatvāt. tathā cābhāvo 'pi paścāt pravartamānas tān utsārayitum apaṭiṣṭhaḥ syād,
GSP29snyayvpu:434: anyathā pratyakṣam asaṅkīrṇasya saṅkīrṇatāgrahaṇād bhrāntam āpanīpadyeta. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:442: tasyāpy abhāvagrahaṇe tadgrāhakapramāṇāntarābhāvo grāhya ity anavasthā. atha arthābhāvāt pramāṇasya pramāṇābhāvāc cārthasyābhāvaḥ pratipadyeta iti manyethās,
GSP29snyayvpu:444: na yāvad arthābhāvo 'gṛhītas tāvat pramāṇābhāvaḥ sidhyaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:445: arthābhāvaś ca pramāṇābhāvāt setsyatīty āvartanāt. athendriyavat svayam avijñāto 'pi pramāṇābhāvo 'rthābhāvaṃ jñāpayiṣyatīty abhidadhīthās,
GSP29snyayvpu:448: indriyasya tu tadviparyastatayā jñānotpādanadakṣatvāt. tasmāt pratyakṣam evam bhūtalādipratiniyatavastugrāhitāṃ bibharti,
GSP29snyayvpu:451: sakalasaṅkīrṇatayā grahaṇaprasaṅgāt. ato 'dhikagrāhyābhāvān nirviṣayatayābhāvākhyaṃ pramāṇaṃ yat paraiḥ paryakalpi tad apramāṇam iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:452: [NAV_1.18] dvidhety asmin saty api pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ceti niyatadvaividhyapradarśanena saugataparikalpitaṃ '
GSP29snyayvpu:455: tadākūtena tasyāyogāt. pratyakṣātiriktaṃ hi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasambandhopalakṣitakāryasvabhāvānupalabdhirūpaliṅgatrayasampāditajanmakam anumānam eva pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:461: tasyā apy atyantābhāvasādhanavirodhāt. sā hi caturvidhā varṇyate mūlabhedāpekṣayā,
GSP29snyayvpu:462: tad yathā -- viruddhopalabdhir viruddhakāryopalabdhiḥ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ svabhāvānupalabdhiś ceti. na tāvad viruddhopalabdheḥ pramāṇāntarasyātyantābhāvo,
GSP29snyayvpu:464: sannihitadeśa eva pratiyogyabhāvasiddheḥ. etena viruddhakāryopalabdhir api vyākhyātā,
GSP29snyayvpu:465: tasyā api pratiṣedhyavirodhisannidhāpanadvāreṇābhāvasādhakatvāt. kāraṇānupalabdhir api taddeśāśaṅkitakāryasyāivābhāvaṃ sādhayati na sarvatra,
GSP29snyayvpu:466: svayam asiddhatvāt. svabhāvānupalabdhir apy ekajñānasaṃsargipadārthopalambharūpā taddeśa eva pratidvandvyabhāvaṃ gamayati. ataḥ pramāṇāntarasyāpi kvacin niṣedhaḥ syān,
GSP29snyayvpu:467: na sarvatra. tan na pramāṇāntarabādhakaṃ samasti.
GSP29snyayvpu:468: [NAV_1.19] pratyakṣānumānayoś ca prāmāṇyaṃ kuta iti cintyam. na tāvat pratyakṣāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:469: tasya nirvikalpakatayā sato 'py asatkalpatvāt. tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpas tu na svalakṣaṇāmbhodhimadhyam avagāhate;
GSP29snyayvpu:470: tat kathaṃ tatrāpraviṣṭas tatsvarūpaṃ niścinuyāt. apramāṇabhūtāc ca tasmāt prāmāṇyanirṇaya iti nibiḍajaḍimāviṣkaraṇaṃ bhavatām. anumānāt prāmāṇyanirṇaya iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:471: tasyāpi svalakṣaṇād bahiḥ plavanāt. aprāmāṇyavyavacchedas tena sādhyata iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:479: vikalpaśūnyatayākiñcitkaratvād ity uktam. anumānāt tu tatsādhane vikalpayugalaṃ tadavastham evāvatiṣṭheta,
GSP29snyayvpu:483: na ca pratyakṣaṃ taṃ lakṣayituṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:485: taduttarakālabhāvino vikalpasyāpi vyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa tanniṣṭhatābhyupagamāt. anumānād grahīṣyatīti cen nanu tad api sambandhapūrvakaṃ pravarteta,
GSP29snyayvpu:486: tadgrahaṇe 'pīyaṃ vārtety anavasthā. tasmād anumānam abhilaṣatā gatyantarābhāvāt
GSP29snyayvpu:489: anyad api yad evaṃvidham avisaṃvādi jñānaṃ tat pramāṇam astv ity alaṃ śuṣkābhimāneneti. yadi punaḥ sādhyārthānyathānupapannahetusampāditam anumānam
GSP29snyayvpu:490: tadā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ cety api dvaividhyaṃ ghaṭām aṭed eva;
GSP29snyayvpu:494: meyaviniścayād iti dvidhaiveti ca kākākṣigolakanyāyenātrāpi sambandhanīyam. tataś cāyam artho:
GSP29snyayvpu:495: dvābhyām eva prakārābhyāṃ meyasya grāhyārthasya viniścayāt svarūpanirṇayād;
GSP29snyayvpu:496: dve eva yathokte pramāṇe na nyūnam adhikaṃ ceti. ayam atrābhiprāyaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:497: svasaṃvedanaṃ prati nikhilajñānānām ekarūpatayā sākṣātkaraṇacaturatvān nāsty eva bhedaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:498: bahirarthaṃ punar apekṣya kaścic cakṣurādisāmagrībalalabdhasattākaḥ svāvayavavyāpinaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:500: viśadanirbhāsaṃ sāmānyam ākāraṃ sākṣātkurvāṇaḥ prakāśaḥ prathate,
GSP29snyayvpu:501: tatra pratyakṣavyavahāraḥ pravartate. yaḥ punar liṅgaśabdādidvāreṇa niyatāniyatasāmānyākārāvalokī
GSP29snyayvpu:502: parisphuṭatārahitaḥ khalv ātmano 'rthagrahaṇapariṇāmaḥ samullasati sa parokṣatāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:503: svīkaroti. na cāitau prakārau vihāya prakārāntareṇa jñānapravṛttiṃ paśyāmo,
GSP29snyayvpu:505: na ca dvayoḥ prathamānayor ekaṃ nihnuvānam apekṣāmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:506: viśeṣābhāvāt. tasmād etad eva dvaividhyam urarīkartavyam iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:507: [NAV_2.0] sāmprataṃ yad asmābhiḥ prāg vivṛṇvadbhir vyudapādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:508: yad uta vipratipannāvyutpannavyāmohāpohasaham ihedaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇam iti tatsūtramātradarśanād
GSP29snyayvpu:509: eva vimalabuddhayo 'vagaccheyuḥ. mandamatayas tu tāvatā na bhotsyanta iti -- taddhitavidhitsayā
GSP29snyayvpu:510: vyaktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānaphalaṃ pratipipādayiṣur api sapūrvapakṣaṃ nirākāṅkṣaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:511: lakṣayeyus ta iti tāvat pūrvapakṣam utthāpayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:515: kim idaṃ māmakaṃ vacanaṃ śrotṛsaṃskārādhāyakam uta neti. itarathā paryālocitakāritāsya hīyate. śrotṛsaṃskārādhāyakaṃ ced uccārayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:516: anyathā viparyaya iti. etat tu pramāṇalakṣaṇavākyaṃ sakalajanānādiprarūḍhārthapratyāyakatvād aśrotṛsaṃskārādhāyakam,
GSP29snyayvpu:519: parokṣagatabhedāpekṣayā bahuvacanaṃ vyaktibhede sāmānyam api kathañcid bhidyata itidarśanārtham. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:520: tad avivakṣitavyaktikam ekarūpatāṃ bibharti pramāṇam iti;
GSP29snyayvpu:521: vyaktyavacchedena punar avacchidyamānaṃ nānātāmādatte pratyakṣānumānaśābdāni pramāṇānīti,
GSP29snyayvpu:523: śabdāc cakṣurāder vā dūrād vṛkṣa iti pratyaye dhavakhadirapalāśādiviśeṣānapekṣayā sādhāraṇaṃ vṛkṣatvam eva cakāsti,
GSP29snyayvpu:529: tatsvarūpavat. viśeṣābhinnam eva rūpaṃ tāttvikaṃ sāmānyasya,
GSP29snyayvpu:531: bhinnaṃ punaḥ kalpanābuddhiviṭhapitatvād avasturūpam iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:532: dvayoḥ prakāśamānayor ekasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt. anyathā bhinnam eva rūpaṃ svābhāvikam
GSP29snyayvpu:533: itarat tu kalpanābuddhidarśitam ity api vadatāṃ na vadanabhaṅgaḥ syāt. arthakriyākāritāviśeṣas
GSP29snyayvpu:535: tasyāpi jñānasādhāraṇavyavahārakaraṇadakṣatvāt. na cārthakriyā vastulakṣaṇam iti nivedayiṣyāmas,
GSP29snyayvpu:536: tasmāt sarvatra bhinnābhinnau sāmānyaviśeṣāv iti darśanārtho bahuvacananirdeśaḥ. āsatāṃ tāvat pramāṇāni.
GSP29snyayvpu:537: [NAV_2.2] vyavahāraś ca tatkṛtaḥ prasiddha iti sambandhaḥ. caśabdo 'piśabdārthaḥ. tenāyam artho:
GSP29snyayvpu:538: yadarthaṃ pramāṇaparīkṣaṇam asāv api jalapānaśītatrāṇādir vyavahāro 'nādiprarūḍhaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:539: tan nirarthakaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānam ity abhiprāyavān api paraḥ paruṣatāparijihīrṣayātmano 'nyathā prāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:540: pramāṇalakṣaṇasyoktau pararūpavyāvartanakṣamāsādhāraṇapramāṇadharmakathanarūpāyāṃ jñāyate nirṇīyate 'smābhir na prayojanaṃ tatphalam,
GSP29snyayvpu:541: atisūkṣmatvāt tāvakābhisandher iti kākvā praśnayaty ulluṇṭhayati ceti. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:543: niścitaṃ vā svarūpeṇeti pakṣadvayam. na tāvad aniścitam,
GSP29snyayvpu:546: tat kim apramāṇāt pramāṇād vā. na tāvad apramāṇād,
GSP29snyayvpu:547: apramāṇasya niścāyakatvāyogāt. yadi punar apramāṇam api niścāyakam iti saṅgīryeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:551: tat kim alakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇopetaṃ vā. alakṣaṇaṃ cen niścāyakaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP29snyayvpu:556: tallakṣaṇaṃ niścitam aniścitaṃ vā. na tāvad aniścitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyaṃ lakṣayati.
GSP29snyayvpu:557: niścayo 'pi pramāṇād apramāṇād vā. apramāṇān niścayāsiddheḥ pramāṇād iti vaktavyam.
GSP29snyayvpu:558: tad apy alakṣaṇaṃ salakṣaṇaṃ vā. alakṣaṇatve pūrvasyārthagrahaṇe kiṃ kṣūṇam. salakṣaṇatve
GSP29snyayvpu:559: tallakṣaṇaṃ nirṇītam anirṇītaṃ veti tad evāvartate. tan na pramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānopāyo 'sti,
GSP29snyayvpu:561: [NAV_3.0] adhunācāryo gṛhītas tāvakīno 'bhiprāyo 'smābhir iti paraṃ pratyāyayaṃs tanmatam anudrāvya tad evānumanyamānas tathāpi lakṣaṇokteḥ sāphalyamāvedayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:566: tatas teṣāṃ lakṣaṇoktāv asādhāraṇadharmakathanaviṣaye prayojanaṃ phalaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:568: tad etad ayuktam. yato yady api pratiprāṇiprasiddhāni pramāṇāny,
GSP29snyayvpu:571: tathāpi kecid vitatamohāvaṣṭabdhāntaḥkaraṇās tatsvarūpam anubhavanto 'pi na lakṣayanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:573: vyāmoham eteṣām apasārayāma iti pramāṇalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ prati pravartate cetaḥ. tad idaṃ prayojanaṃ:
GSP29snyayvpu:575: tasmin pramāṇalakṣaṇe vyāmoho viparītābhyupagamavatāṃ viparyāsalakṣaṇas tīrthyānāṃ pramāṇāpramāṇavivekavikalānām,
GSP29snyayvpu:577: tasya nivṛttir aviparītalakṣaṇāvagamād apagama ity arthaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:578: sā syād bhavet. keṣām ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:579: vyāmūḍhaṃ viparītagrahagrastaṃ vicittatāṃ gataṃ mano 'ntaḥkaraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ te tathā teṣām;
GSP29snyayvpu:580: iheti loke -- tad ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ. yady anādi prasiddhaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ prati na kecid api vyāmuhyeyus tadā yad bhavadbhiḥ prāg udagrāhi:
GSP29snyayvpu:582: iti tad yuktam eva syāt. na cāitad evaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:583: tatra vyāmūḍhānāṃ darśanāt. etena yad adāyi dūṣaṇaṃ '
GSP29snyayvpu:585: ityādi tad api siddhasādhyatāmadhyapratibaddhatvān na bādhāvidhāyy asmākam iti mantavyam. vyāmūḍhamanaso 'pi prati pramāṇalakṣaṇaprakāśane tal lagatīti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:587: tasya vyāmohāpoha eva vyāpārāt. yathā viviktabhūtalāvalokane 'py adhyakṣāt yo ghaṭādivaiviktyaṃ na pratipadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:594: tathehāpi vidvadbhir draṣṭavyam. nirṇītaṃ tallakṣaṇam adhyakṣeṇa,
GSP29snyayvpu:596: vacanaṃ punar viparītāropanirākaraṇe vyāpriyata iti sthitam. tad evaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyena pratipādya tadgataṃ kucodyaṃ paryahāry ācāryeṇa.
GSP29snyayvpu:597: [NAV_4.0] adhunā tadviṣayām eva saṃkhyāvipratipattiṃ nirācikīrṣatā ye pratyakṣaparokṣalakṣaṇe pramāṇavyaktī prāk prakrānte,
GSP29snyayvpu:598: tayor api lakṣaṇaṃ prati vipratipadyante 'pare. atas tallakṣaṇam api vaktavyam iti tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇam abhidhātukāma āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:603: aparokṣatayārthasya grāhakaṃ jñānam iti lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ. parokṣo 'kṣagocarātītas,
GSP29snyayvpu:606: sākṣātkṛtatayeti yāvat. aryata ity artho 'vagamyata iti hṛdayam;
GSP29snyayvpu:607: arthyata iti vārtho dāhapākādyarthakriyārthibhir abhilaṣyata iti yāvat. tasya grāhakaṃ vyavasāyātmakatayā sākṣāt paricchedakaṃ yaj jñānaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:608: tad īdṛśam itīdṛg eva pratyakṣam iti saṇṭaṅkaḥ. tatra jñānagrahaṇena yat sāṃkhyāḥ prāhuḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:611: śrotrādīnāṃ prakṛtivikāratayā tadvṛtter vyāpāralakṣaṇāyā jaḍatayā pratyakṣatvāyogād;
GSP29snyayvpu:614: [NAV_4.2] arthasya grāhakam ity asya grahaṇekṣayeti vakṣyamāṇapadasāpekṣatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:615: amunā bahir api ye 'rthakalākalanavikalaṃ sakalam api jñānaṃ pralapanti tān nirasyati;
GSP29snyayvpu:616: svāṃśagrahaṇe hy antaḥsaṃvedanaṃ vyāpriyate yathā -- tathā bahir apītarathārthavaj jñānasantānāntarāṇy api viśīryeran,
GSP29snyayvpu:618: svavijñānasyāiva tathā tathā vijṛmbhaṇāt. tathā ca pramāṇaprameyapratipādyapratipādakakāryakāraṇabhāvādayaḥ pralīyerann,
GSP29snyayvpu:619: ātmavyatirekeṇātmīyapūrvottarakṣaṇayor api jñānasya pravṛttinirodhāpatteḥ. advayavijñānatattvasādhanenānukūlam ācarasīti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:621: yadi bhavataḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭasakalavyavahārocchedena kudarśanavāsanāhitādṛṣṭādvayatattvaparikalpanāt pratikūlaṃ na syāt. tan nārthaviraheṇa bahiḥpramāṇabhūtajñānollāso 'sti,
GSP29snyayvpu:631: tataś cāsāv upanipatya svagocaraṃ saṃvedanam utthāpayan svākāram anukārayati. tan na tadgrāhiṇi vijñāne śabdasaṃśleṣo yuktaḥ. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:632: yady utpādakārthopayoge 'pi taṃ tāvan na gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:633: saṃvedanam api tu smaraṇasampāditaṃ tadabhidhāyakadhvanisaṃyojanaṃ pratīkṣamāṇaṃ tāvad āsīta,
GSP29snyayvpu:634: tarhi datto jalāñjalir arthagrahaṇasya. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:635: tam artham apaśyaṃs tasmin gṛhītasaṅketaṃ tadabhidhāyakadhvaniṃ nānusmaraty,
GSP29snyayvpu:637: ananusmaraṃś ca purovartiny arthe na yojayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:639: ayojayaṃś ca bhavadabhiprāyeṇa na paśyatīti dhāndhyād āndhyamāpadyeta. yadi cendriyajam api jñānaṃ vikalpakaluṣitam iṣyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:640: tadā tad api manorājyādivikalpavad vikalpāntarāvirbhāve sati nivarteta;
GSP29snyayvpu:643: saṃhṛtasakalavikalpasyāpi ca parisphuṭasannihitārthaviṣayadarśanasiddheḥ. tan nākṣajaṃ jñānaṃ śabdasamparkam anubhavatīti.
GSP29snyayvpu:647: na hi śabdāsampṛktārthajam ity etāvatāivābhilāpavinākṛtam iti vaktuṃ śakyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:648: anyathā jaḍārthajanitam iti jaḍam api tat syāt. atha bodharūpamanaskārasāhityān na jaḍam iti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:649: tathā saty abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭamanaskārasanniyogāt sābhilāpam api syāt. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:650: viviktāḥ paramāṇavaḥ svākārārpaṇadvāreṇa svagocaraṃ jñānam utpādayantaḥ katham asantam ātmani svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ tatra prathayanti. vibhramād iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:651: nedānīm arthe yad asti tad eva pratibhāti,
GSP29snyayvpu:652: tatrāsato 'pi sthūrākārasya pratibhāsanāt. tathā śabdo 'pi. yady avidyamāno 'rthe tadgrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāseta kiṃ kṣūyeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:653: yac coktam: 'smaraṇajanitaśabdasaṃyojanaṃ pratīkṣamānam arthopayoge 'pi yady āsītety'ādi yāvad '
GSP29snyayvpu:660: nirvikalpakasya sato 'pi vyavahāraṃ praty asatkalpatvāt. sa ca vikalpaḥ saṅketakālabhāvitam abhilāpasāmānyam anusmarata evotpattum arhati,
GSP29snyayvpu:663: nanu tad api darśanaṃ nirvikalpakatvād arthaṃ nātiśete,
GSP29snyayvpu:665: arthaḥ punaḥ sāmānyavyavasāyātmikāṃ buddhiṃ na janayed iti bhavatāṃ kadāgrahaḥ. tad arthavat tadviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ vyavasāyaśūnyatvān nābhilāpasāmānyagocarasmaraṇabījaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:671: aviśiṣṭaḥ pramātur āndhyaṃ lakṣayatīti. tasmād yathā kathañcinnirṇayābhāvāt svayam
GSP29snyayvpu:672: apratītam api nirvikalpakadarśanaṃ vāsanāprabodhadvāreṇa vikalpam utthāpyātmavyāpāram
GSP29snyayvpu:677: saṃvedanam ullāsayen nātyantam ayuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na cāyaṃ savikalpako bodho manorājyādivikalpakalpaś,
GSP29snyayvpu:679: itarasya tu manomātraprabhavatvāt. ataḥ kathaṃ tadvikalpāntarāvirbhāve nivarteta?
GSP29snyayvpu:681: asya tu kāraṇasāmarthyena balāt pravṛtteḥ. etena saṃhṛtasakalavikalpāvasthāyāṃ nāiṣa prāduḥṣyād ity etad api pratikṣiptam,
GSP29snyayvpu:683: mānasavikalpasaṃharaṇa eva tatsāmarthyopapatter iti. etac ca śabdasampṛktapratyakṣapakṣād apy ekāntanirvikalpakapratyakṣapakṣasya pāpīyastāṃ darśayadbhir asmābhir udagrāhi.
GSP29snyayvpu:684: [NAV_4.5] paramārthataḥ punaḥ pratyakṣe sākṣāc chabdollekho neṣyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:685: viśadavyavasāyenārthasākṣātkaraṇacaturatvāt tasya. kevalaṃ tad api sannihitaṃ parisphuṭaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:687: padārthāntaraiḥ saha samānāsamānākāraṃ svaparamāṇūnāṃ sāmānyākāraṃ stambhādhikaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:691: 'rthe saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhagrahaṇādayas tadviṣayāḥ śābdavyavahārāḥ sarva eva nirupacaritā
GSP29snyayvpu:692: ghaṭanta ity uktaṃ bhavati. yadi punaḥ śabdasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsam adhyakṣaṃ na syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:695: nirvyavasāyaṃ darśanam atyantapāṭavopetam api smṛtibījādhānaṃ taduttarakālabhāvi vā tādṛśārthadarśanaṃ tatprabodhanam abhyāsavāsanāpāṭave 'pi na vidhātum alaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:698: tasmād yatra kutracid arthāṃśe pāścātyavyavahārapravṛttis tatra prācīnaṃ saṃvedanaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:700: anyathā kṣaṇikatvādyaṃśavat sarvāṃśeṣu vyavahāraḥ pralīyeta. tan na kadācana kalpanāpoḍhatvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:701: pratyakṣasya pramātur api pratītigocaracāritām anubhavati. apratītaṃ cāstīti śraddhātuṃ duḥśakam,
GSP29snyayvpu:705: tadviparītasya tu svapnakāle 'py aprakāśamānatvāt. tad yadi yathāvasthitārthagrāhitvam abhrāntatvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:708: teṣāṃ ca pāramārthikatvāt. atha vyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa yad idaṃ ghaṭādikaṃ svalakṣaṇam arthakriyākṣamaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:709: tatra yan na bhrāmyati tad abhrāntam ity abhipretaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:714: dṛṣṭasyāpy adṛṣṭānatiśayanāt. tasmād vyavasāyātmakam adhyakṣam ity etad eva cārv iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:715: [NAV_4.7] aparokṣatayety anena tu parokṣalakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇatām adhyakṣasya pariharati,
GSP29snyayvpu:716: tasya sākṣātkāritayā arthagrahaṇarūpatvād iti. īdṛśam ity amunā tu pūrvoktanyāyāt
GSP29snyayvpu:718: pratyakṣatāṃ pratikṣipati. evaṃ ca yad āhur:
GSP29snyayvpu:720: tathā “satsamprayoge puruṣasyendriyāṇāṃ buddhijanma tat pratyakṣam” ityādi tad ayuktam ity uktaṃ bhavaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:722: atyantāsatāṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnām apy utpattiprasaṅgāt. tasmād idam ātmarūpatayā vidyamānam eva viśeṣakṛddhetukalāpasannidhānāt sākṣād arthagrahaṇapariṇāmarūpatayā
GSP29snyayvpu:723: tathā cotpannajanmādiviśeṣaṇaṃ na sambhavet. athāivaṃvidhārthasūcakam evāitad ity ācakṣīthās,
GSP29snyayvpu:724: tathā saty avigānam evety āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:726: itarad ityādi. aparokṣatayārthasya grāhakaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam ity uktam,
GSP29snyayvpu:727: tasmād itarad asākṣād arthagrāhakaṃ jñānaṃ parokṣam iti jñeyam avagantavyam. etad api svasaṃvedanāpekṣayā pratyakṣam eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:728: bahirarthāpekṣayā tu parokṣavyapadeśam aśnuta iti darśayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:730: iha grahaṇaṃ prakramād bahiḥ pravartanam ucyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:735: tathāpi liṅgaśabdādidvāreṇa bahirviṣayagrahaṇe 'sākṣātkāritayā vyāpriyata iti parokṣam
GSP29snyayvpu:737: iti. sāmānyalakṣaṇasadbhāvād ekākāram api vipratipattinirākaraṇārthaṃ dvidhā bhidyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:738: tad yathā: anumānaṃ śābdaṃ ceti. yato 'dyāpi śabdasyārthānyathānupapannatvam eva pare na pratipadyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:743: anumānaṃ, tad abhrāntaṃ pramāṇatvāt samakṣavat // NA_5 //
GSP29snyayvpu:745: tasya prasiddhatayā anūdyatvāt. sādhyāvinābhuno liṅgāt sādhyaniścāyakam iti lakṣaṇanirdeśaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:748: [Anu] paścān mīyate paricchidyate 'rtho 'numeyaḥ pāvakādir yena jñānena tad anumānam
GSP29snyayvpu:751: sādhayituṃ vā śakya iti sādhyo 'numeya ity arthaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:752: tasya niścāyakaṃ tatsvarūpanirṇāyakam iti yāvat. tat kuta ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:753: liṅgāl -- liṅgyate gamyate 'rtho 'neneti liṅgaṃ hetus tasmāt. kiṃbhūtād ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:757: sādhyaṃ vimucya yan na bhavatīty arthaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:758: tasmāt sādhyaniścāyakaṃ jñānaṃ tad anumānam. smṛtam abhipretaṃ nītividbhir iti sambandhaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:759: tatra liṅgāt sādhyaniścāyakam ity anenānumānasya pratyakṣaśābdalakṣaṇasaṅkīrṇatāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:760: vārayati. sādhyāvinābhuna ity anena parapraṇītaliṅgalakṣaṇavyudāsam ācaṣṭe.
GSP29snyayvpu:761: [NAV_5.2] tataś ca yat pare procuḥ -- pakṣadharmatvānvayavyatirekalakṣaṇarūpatrayopalakṣitāni trīṇy eva liṅgāni:
GSP29snyayvpu:762: anupalabdhiḥ svabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ ceti; tad uktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:766: [NAV_2] tathānye: “'syedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃyogi samavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam” iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:767: tathā: “pūrvavac cheṣavat sāmānyatodṛṣṭam” ityādi -- tad bālapralapitaprāyam ity avagantavyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:781: vṛkṣāc chāyām ityādi pakṣadharmatvavirahe 'py anumimīmahe. kālādikas tatra dharmī samasty eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:782: tatra pakṣadharmatā liṅgasya gṛhyata iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:784: evaṃ hi śabdasyānityatve sādhye kākakārṣṇyāder api gamakatvaprasaktes,
GSP29snyayvpu:785: tatrāpi lokāder dharmiṇaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyatvāt. tathānvayavikalo 'py anityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:786: śrāvaṇatvād ity ayaṃ samyagghetutayā samarthayituṃ śakya iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:788: tāvakākūtenāiva sakalaṃ sattvam anityatayā kroḍīkṛtam iti bhāvadharmaḥ śrāvaṇatvaṃ katham anityatāṃ vihāya vipakṣe vartitum utsaheta,
GSP29snyayvpu:793: ghaṭādivad ity ayam api gamako vyākhyātaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:796: [NAV_5.3] tathā kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhirūpaliṅgatrayaniyamo 'pi kila tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇasambandhāstitvam eteṣv eveti yaḥ kriyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:798: prakṛtasambandhadvayavikalasyāpi rūpāde rasādigamakatvadarśanāt. mā bhūt tasya tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ gamakatvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:800: tathāpi nānyathānupapannatvam eva hetor lakṣaṇam iti yadi vaiśeṣiko manyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:801: so 'nyathā nirloṭhanīyaḥ. sa hi vikalpataḥ paryanuyojyaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:802: samavāyibhyaḥ samavāyo 'bhinno bhinno vā. yady abhinnaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:815: svāṃśavartane 'pi sāmastyāikadeśacodyāvatārāc ca. tatrāpi sāmastyapakṣe bahutvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:816: tadavastham eva. ekadeśapakṣe tv aṃśāntaraprasaṅgenānavasthā. tan na samavāyabalāt
GSP29snyayvpu:818: tasyāiva tatra duḥsthitatvāt. etena saṃyogino 'pi gamakatā pratyuktā,
GSP29snyayvpu:819: samānadūṣaṇatvāt. virodhino 'pi viruddhābhāvagamakatvam anyathānupapannatvam eva sūcayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:821: [NAV_5.4] evaṃ paraparikalpitam anyad api liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ yad gamakatāṅgaṃ tad anyathānupapannatvaṃ na vyabhicarati,
GSP29snyayvpu:825: [NAV_5.5] tad evam anumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyādhunā yac chauddhodaniśiṣyakair nyagādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:830: atasmiṃs tadgrahaṇasya ca bhrāntilakṣaṇatvāt. prāmāṇyaṃ punaḥ praṇālikayā bahiḥ svalakṣaṇabalāyātatvād anumānasya. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:835: arthāvyabhicāritvād bhrāntam api pramāṇam iti saṅgīryate; tad uktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:836: “atasmiṃs tadgraho bhrāntir api sambandhataḥ prameti” -- tad apākartum āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:840: aviparītārthagrāhīti yāvat. iyaṃ ca pratijñā. pramīyate yathāvasthito 'rthaḥ paricchidyate 'neneti pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:841: tadbhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt. ayaṃ tu hetuḥ. saṅgatam akṣāṇām iti samakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:842: tad iva samakṣavad iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tad idam anumānasya bhrāntatānirākārakaṃ sampūrṇāvayavam,
GSP29snyayvpu:847: iha yad yat pramāṇaṃ tat tad abhrāntaṃ yathā samakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:849: tasmāt pramāṇatvād abhrāntam iti pratipadyantām iti. tatrārthavādī tāvat samakṣalakṣaṇe dṛṣṭānte sādhyavikalatām āvirbhāvayituṃ na pārayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:850: svayam eva samakṣasyābhrāntatayā 'bhyupagamāt. śūnyavādinaḥ punaḥ samastāpalāpitvāt pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraṃ praty ayogyatāiveti na tam adhikṛtya svasādhanadoṣāḥ parihartavyāḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:853: yady asti tarhi pratijñāhāniḥ. atha nāsti,
GSP29snyayvpu:858: grāhyagrāhakākārakaluṣitaṃ bahiṣprathamānaṃ nikhilam api jñānaṃ viparyastatayā pratijānānaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:862: bhrāntaṃ pramāṇam ity etad viruddhaṃ vacanaṃ yataḥ // NA_6 //
GSP29snyayvpu:864: yad uta na kevalam anumānaṃ bhrāntaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:865: kiṃ tarhi yad bhavadbhir dṛṣṭāntatayopāttaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tad api bhrāntam eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:867: tad etan na. kuta ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:870: [NAV_6.2] nanu ca pramāṇatām abhrāntatānyathānupapannāṃ yadi paraḥ pratipadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:871: tatas tām abhyupagacchan kathaṃ bhrāntatāvipratipattiṃ vidadhyād iti pārśvasthitavacanāvakāśam āśaṅkya,
GSP29snyayvpu:872: bhrāntatāpramāṇatayor virodhasādhanena tataḥ pramāṇatāṃ vyāvartyānanyaśaraṇatayā pratijñātābhrāntatākrāntāṃ tāṃ darśayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:873: bhrāntam ityādi. bhrāntaṃ viparyastam atha ca pramāṇaṃ grāhyaparicchedahetur ity etad vacanam evaṃviddhārthapratyāyako dhvanir viruddhaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:876: tathā hy: aviditaparamārthavyāvahārikābhiprāyeṇa lokasaṃvṛtiṃ ghaṭayanto vayaṃ dṛḍhataravāsanāprabodhasampāditasattākayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoḥ pramāṇatām ācakṣmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:877: tadabhiprāyeṇa darśitārthaprāpakatvena tayor avisaṃvādakatvāt. śithilavāsanāunmukhyanirmitajanmakayoḥ punar apramāṇatāṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:879: bhrāntatāṃ punas tattvacintakābhiprāyeṇa sakalasya bahir upaplavamānasya grāhyagrāhakākārakāluṣyadūṣitasya pratibhāsasya pāramārthikādvayasaṃvedanaviparyastarūpatvād
GSP29snyayvpu:882: gatyantarābhāvāt. na tāvad avayavirūpo vicāraṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:885: teṣv asāv ekadeśena vartate sāmastyena vā. na tāvad ekadeśena,
GSP29snyayvpu:886: tasya svayaṃ niravayavatvāt. avayavavṛttinimittam aṃśāntarakalpane tadvṛttāv apy aṃśāntarakalpanaprasaṅgas,
GSP29snyayvpu:890: na: tatrāpy avayavamātram avayavimātraṃ vā syād,
GSP29snyayvpu:893: samastāvayavavyāpino 'vayavino 'bhyupagame paṭāder ekadeśarāgakampadarśanādiṣu sakalarāgakampadarśanādīni durnivārāṇi syur,
GSP29snyayvpu:894: ekasya rāgārāgādiviruddhadharmādhyāsāyogād iti. nāpy avayavarūpo 'rtho vicāragocaracārī
GSP29snyayvpu:896: paramāṇūnāṃ niraṃśatayāvayavatvam upapadyata iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:904: [NAV_6.4] atra pratividhīyate -- yad avādi saṃvedanam advayaṃ pāramārthikaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:908: bahir antaś cānekākāratayā harṣaviṣādādibhiḥ sthirasthūratādyanekadharmaparikaritārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś ca vivartamānaṃ saṃvedanam upalabhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:909: na punar vedyavedakākāraviviktaṃ yādṛg bhavadbhir upavarṇyate jñānaṃ tādṛśaṃ kasyacit kadācana pratītigocaracāritām anubhavaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:910: advayapratibhāsasya svapnadaśāyām apy ananubhūteḥ. na ca tattvacintakā api pramāṇam antareṇa svākūtaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantaḥ prekṣāvatām avadheyavacanā
GSP29snyayvpu:911: anyathāikam acetanam avyayam api brahmānekaṃ cetanaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅguratākrāntam avidyātaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:912: prathata iti bruvāṇo 'nirākāryaḥ syāt. yad api bahirarthanirākaraṇadhiyā avayavyavayavadvāreṇa dūṣaṇam adāyi,
GSP29snyayvpu:916: pratyakṣapratibhāsāpahnave tanmūlakatvāt kuyuktivikalpānām utthānābhāvāt. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:918: samānam eveti na dūṣaṇam. anekākāravivartasyālīkatvān na tena saha saṃvedanasya pāramārthikasya
GSP29snyayvpu:920: nanv evam itaretarāśrayaṃ duruttaram āḍhaukate. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:922: tatsiddhau ca tadalīkatvam iti nyāyāt. anyac cādvayam apy ekakṣaṇavarti saṃvedanaṃ yathā pūrvottarakṣaṇābhyāṃ sambandham anubhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:923: tathā niraṃśā api yadi paramāṇavo digaṃśaiḥ paramāṇvantarair vā saṃśleṣamāgaccheyuḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:924: kim ayuktaṃ syāt. na cāvayavyavayavayor ekāntavyatirekāvyatirekapakṣe yad dūṣaṇaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:927: bahir antaś ca tathāiva prakāśamānatayā tayor nihnotum aśakyatvāt. etena rāgārāgakampākampādivirodhodbhāvanam api prativyūḍhaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:932: bhinnapravṛttinimittatvāc ca sarvadharmānāṃ tadviparyayasampādyo virodho dūrāpāsta eva. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:934: abhyupayato bahirarthe viruddhadharmādhyāsapratiṣedhabuddhiḥ kevalaṃ jāḍyaṃ sūcayati.
GSP29snyayvpu:935: tan na pramāṇaṃ kathañcid bhrāntaṃ samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:939: na ca tadudayasamaye kasyacid idam alīkārtham idaṃ tv analīkārtham iti vivekenāvadhāraṇaṃ samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:940: bhrāntābhrāntābhimatayos tadekarūpatayā prakāśanāt. yadā ca viśadadarśanapathacāriṇo 'pi śaśadharayugalādayo 'līkatām āviśanto dṛśyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:941: tadā sakalasatyārthatābhimatapratibhāseṣv apy alīkārthatāśaṅkānivṛtter anāśvāsa eva. na ca tadarthaprāptyādikam ārekānirākaraṇakāraṇaṃ kalpanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:942: svapnāvasthāyāṃ tatsadbhāve 'py alīkārthatāsiddheḥ. bādhakapratyayopanipātāt tasyāsatyārthateti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:943: tasya svagocaraparyavasitatvena bādhakatvāyogāt. anyathā nīlam ādadānā devadattabuddhiḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:954: anyathā tadbhrāntatāyogāt. evaṃ ca tajjātīyam anyad apy abhrāntaṃ syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:955: tataś ca sakalapratibhāsasya samastasaṃvedanasya bhrāntatvāsiddhito viparyastatvāniṣpatter
GSP29snyayvpu:956: yat sphuṭaṃ svānyaniścāyi suniścitatayā svaparaprakāśakaṃ tat pramāṇam iti sambandhaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:957: tac ca dvayasiddhau svarūpārthalakṣaṇayugmaniṣpattau prasiddhyati niṣpadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:958: anyathā prameyābhāve pramāṇābhāvāt. tasmāt pramāṇam urarīkurvāṇenārtho 'py abhyupagantavya ity abhiprāya iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:959: [NAV_8.0] tad evaṃ svārthānumānalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādya tadvatāṃ bhrāntatāvipratipattiṃ ca nirākṛtyādhunāpratipāditaparārthānumānalakṣaṇa evālpavaktavyatvāt tāvac chābdalakṣaṇam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:964: vidheyatvāt. dṛṣṭena pramāṇāvalokiteneṣṭaḥ pratipādayiṣito 'vyāhato 'nirākṛtaḥ sāmarthyād artho yasmin vākye tattathā,
GSP29snyayvpu:966: tasmāt. paramo 'kṛtrimaḥ puruṣopayogī śakyānuṣṭhāno vārtho vācyas,
GSP29snyayvpu:967: tam abhidhātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tat paramārthābhidhāyi,
GSP29snyayvpu:968: viśiṣṭārthadarśakam ity arthaḥ. tatas tattvagrāhitayotpannaṃ prakṛtavākyapratipādyārthādānaśīlatayā
GSP29snyayvpu:969: labdhātmasattākaṃ yan mānaṃ tac śābdam iti prakīrtitam upavarṇitaṃ pūrvācāryair iti
GSP29snyayvpu:970: sambandhaḥ. tatra dṛṣṭeṣṭāvyāhatād ity anena kutīrthikavacasāṃ laukikavipratārakoktīnāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:972: pramāṇabādhitatvāt. vākyād ity amunā tu vākyasyāiva niyatārthadarśakatvāt paramārthābhidhāyiteti
GSP29snyayvpu:973: darśayan padāc chābdābhāvam āha. paramārthābhidhāyina ity anena jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśādivacanaprabhavajñānasya
GSP29snyayvpu:974: niṣphalatayā prāmāṇyaṃ nirācaṣṭe. tattvagrāhitayotpannam ity amunā tv evaṃbhūtād
GSP29snyayvpu:975: api vākyāc chrotṛdoṣād viparītādyarthagrahaṇacaturatayā prādurbhūtasya śābdatvaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:976: vārayati. mānam ity anenāntarbhāvitapropasargārthena śābde parasyāprāmāṇyabuddhiṃ tiraskurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:980: nāpramāṇasya sūcakatvāyogāt. nanu ca hetupratipādane yadi tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:985: taddarśite 'rthe vikalpapratīkṣaṇāt tasyāiva prāmāṇyam āsajyeta. tadgṛhītam evārtham asāv abhilāpayatīti cec chabdapratipāditaṃ hetuṃ pramāṇāntaraṃ samarthayata iti samāno nyāyaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:987: laukikaṃ śāstrajaṃ ceti. tatredam dvayor api sādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratipāditaṃ. samarthanaṃ punar avipratārakavacanaprabhavasyehādivākyaprastāva eva laukikasya vihitaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:988: śāstrajasya tu vidhātavyam iti yādṛśaḥ śāstrāt tajjātaṃ pramāṇatām anubhavati tad darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:992: śiṣyate 'neneti vā śāstram. tat kiṃbhūtam iti tadviśeṣaṇāny āha. āptaḥ prakṣīṇāśeṣarāgādidoṣagaṇas,
GSP29snyayvpu:998: tasya rāgādikaluṣitatvena vitathārthakathanapravṛtteḥ. tadanuṣṭhānād api svakāryasiddhau praṇayanārtham api puruṣaḥ kiṃ neṣyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:999: viśeṣābhāvāt. tan na kṣīṇadoṣavacanaṃ vyatiricyānyataḥ prekṣāvatāṃ paralokādāv adṛṣṭe 'rthe pravṛttir yuktā;
GSP29snyayvpu:1002: [NAV_9.2] ata evollaṅghyate prābalyena gamyate 'bhibhūyate anyair ity ullaṅghyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1004: sarvavacanātiśāyīti yāvat. ata eva dṛṣṭena pramāṇanirṇīteneṣṭasya tadvācyasya virodho yasmiṃs tattathā tad eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:1011: [NAV_9.3] tadiyatā śāstrasya svārthasampad uktā. adhunā tattvopadeśādīnāṃ parārthatvāt parārthasampadam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1014: teṣāṃ upadeśaḥ svarūpaprakāśanaṃ tadrakṣaṇādividhānaṃ vā. taṃ karoti tattvopadeśakṛt. ata eva sārvaṃ sarvasmai hitaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1019: sarvajanāpakārikumatavidhvaṃsakam ity arthaḥ. īdṛśād eva śāstrāj jātaṃ śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1023: tac ca pratyakṣe 'pi paśyann ekayogakṣematvāt sāmānyenāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1025: parārthaṃ mānam ākhyātaṃ vākyaṃ tadupacārataḥ // NA_10 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1027: svaniścayavad ityādi lakṣaṇam. sva ātmā tasya niścayaḥ prameyādhigamas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1029: yathātmano 'rthanirṇayas tathā pareṣāṃ nirṇayajananam ity arthaḥ. budhair vidvadbhiḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1030: parasmai arthaḥ prayojanaṃ yena tat parārthaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1034: tathā jñānam api parapratyāyanāya vyāpriyamānaṃ parārthaṃ prāpnotīty āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1040: svaparopakāritvāc ca. kathaṃ vacanam ajñānarūpaṃ pramāṇam ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1044: pratipādyagatam utpatsyamānaṃ yaj jñānaṃ tad avyavahitakāraṇatvād vacanam apy upacāreṇa pramāṇam ity ucyate. tatrānumānasya pārārthyaṃ parair abhyupagatam eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:1046: kiledaṃ śabdapraveśaśūnyasvalakṣaṇagrāhīti nāitadgocaraḥ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryate. na ca śabdāt parasya svalakṣaṇagrahaṇadakṣaṃ pratyakṣam
GSP29snyayvpu:1047: śabdasya vikalpotpāditatvena parasyāpi vikalpotpādakatvāt. tad uktaṃ:
GSP29snyayvpu:1049: kāryakāraṇatā teṣāṃ nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśanty api” //
GSP29snyayvpu:1051: ato na śabdajanyam ity ato 'numānaṃ dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya pratyakṣasyāpi parārthatāṃ sādhayitum āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1053: parasya tadupāyatvāt parārthatvaṃ dvayor api // NA_11 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1054: [NAV_11.1] pratyakṣeṇāpy anumāneneva prasiddhārthaprakāśanāt svapratītaprameyapratyāyakatvāt parārthatvaṃ pratipādyaprayojanatvaṃ dvayor api
GSP29snyayvpu:1056: nānumānasyāivāikasyety abhiprāyaḥ. iha cāśrūyamāṇatvāt tadarthagamanāc cāpīvaśabdau luptanirdiṣṭau draṣṭavyau. pratyakṣapratītārthapratyāyanaṃ ca pratijānānasyāyam abhiprāyo:
GSP29snyayvpu:1057: yat paro manyate -- nāitadgocaraṃ parebhyaḥ pratipādayituṃ pāryata iti -- tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1058: nirvikalpakādhyakṣāpohena vyavasāyarūpasya pratyakṣasya prāg eva sādhitatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1059: tadgocarasya kathañcid vikalpagamyatvena śabdapratipādyatvāt. tad yathānumānapratīto 'rthaḥ parasmai pratipādyamāno vacanarūpāpannaḥ parārtham
GSP29snyayvpu:1063: anumānapratītaṃ pratyāyayann evaṃ vacanayaty -- agnir atra dhūmād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1070: avyutpannavismṛtasambandhayos tathāiva pratipādayituṃ śakyatvāt. smaryamāṇe sambandhe punar evam:
GSP29snyayvpu:1073: anyathā dhūmānupapatteḥ. pratyakṣapratītaṃ punar darśayann etāvad vakti:
GSP29snyayvpu:1074: 'paśya rāja gacchati'. tataś ca vacanād dvividhād api samagrasāmagrīkasya pratipādyasyānumeyapratyakṣārthaviṣayā yataḥ pratītir ullasaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1076: parasya tadupāyatvāt pratipādyasya pratītiṃ prati pratipādakasthapratyakṣānumānanirṇītārthaprakāśanakāraṇatvād ity arthaḥ. etena pūrvakārikoktopacārakāraṇaṃ ca lakṣayati.
GSP29snyayvpu:1081: sāmānyaviśeṣātmakārthaviṣayasya nirṇayarūpasya tasya kathañcid ekaviṣayatayā śabdotpādyatvāvirodhād,
GSP29snyayvpu:1082: evaṃvidhasya ca prāg eva samarthanāt. cakṣurādisāmagrītas tad utpadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1084: anumānam api pratyakṣādiniścitād dhetor avismṛtasambandhasya pramātur ullasati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1086: atas tasyāpi parārthatā viśīryeta. samarthahetukathanāt tatra vacanasya parārthateti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:1087: atrāpi darśanayogyārthapratipādanād iti brūmaḥ. tan na pratyakṣaparokṣayoḥ pārārthyaṃ prati viśeṣopalabdhir iti mucyatāṃ pakṣapātaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1088: [NAV_12.0] tad evaṃ dvayor api parārthatāṃ pratipādya tatsvarūpam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1090: pratyakṣaṃ pratibhāsasya nimittatvāt tad ucyate // NA_12 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1091: [NAV_12.1] yad vacaḥ pratyakṣapratipannārthapratipādi sākṣātkārijñānagocarakathanacaturaṃ tat pratyakṣam ucyata iti sambandhaḥ. tac ca pratyakṣarūpam evocyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1092: vipratipannaṃ prati punar anumānadvāreṇocyamānam anumānam eveti caśabdenānekārthatvād darśayati. vacanaṃ kutaḥ pratyakṣam ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1093: pratibhāsasya nimittatvāt pratipādyapratyakṣaprakāśahetutvād upacāreṇocyata ity arthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1098: tasya sādhyāvinābhuvaḥ prāṅ nirūpitasya yad vacaḥ pratipādakaṃ sandarśakaṃ tad anumānaprakāśahetutvāt parārtham anumānam. tat kīdṛśaṃ?
GSP29snyayvpu:1099: ity āha: pakṣo vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇaḥ sa ādir yeṣāṃ hetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanādīnāṃ tāni tathā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1101: tāny evātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tat pakṣādivacanātmakam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1102: [NAV_13.2] nanu ca hetupratipādakaṃ vacaḥ parārtham anumānam ity abhidhāya tat pakṣādivacanātmakam iti vadataḥ pūrvāparavyāhatā vāco yuktiḥ. nāitad asty;
GSP29snyayvpu:1104: kiṃ tarhi yathā parasya sukhena prameyapratītir bhavati tathā yatnataḥ pratyāyanīyaḥ. tatra daśāvayavaṃ sādhanaṃ pratipādanopāyaḥ. tad yathā -- pakṣādayaḥ pañca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1105: tacchuddhayaś ca. tatra yadā pratipādyaḥ prakramād eva nirṇītapakṣo 'vismṛtadṛṣṭāntasmāryapratibandhagrāhakapramāṇo vyutpannamatitvāc cheṣāvayavābhyūhanasamarthaś ca bhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1106: yad vātyantābhyāsena parikarmitamatitvāt tāvatāiva prastutaprameyam avabudhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1108: śeṣābhidhānasya śrotṛsaṃskārākāritayā nairarthakyād ityādau hetupratipādanaṃ sūtrakṛtā parārtham anumānam uktam. yadā tu pratipādyasya nādyāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:1109: tadākāṇḍa eva hetūpanyāso 'dṛṣṭamudgarapātāyamānaḥ syād iti pakṣo 'pi nirdiśyate.
GSP29snyayvpu:1110: tathāsmaryamāṇe pratibandhagrāhiṇi pramāṇe dṛṣṭānto 'pi varṇyetānyathā hetoḥ sāmarthyānavagateḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1111: smṛte 'pi pramāṇe dārṣṭāntike yojayitum ajānānasyopanayo darśyate. tathāpi sākāṅkṣasya nigamanam ucyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1112: 'nyathā nirākulaprastutārthāsiddheḥ. tathā yatra pakṣādau svarūpavipratipattis tatra
GSP29snyayvpu:1113: tacchuddhiḥ pramāṇena kartavyetarathā teṣāṃ svasādhyāsādhanāt. sarveṣāṃ cāmīṣāṃ sādhanāvayavatvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1115: [NAV_13.3] nanu ca svaniścayavat paraniścayotpādanaṃ parārtham anumānam uktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1118: na hi pratipattā pakṣaṃ kṛtvā tato hetuṃ nibhālayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1120: tathā pratīter abhāvāt. kiṃ cānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hetor eva sāmarthyam unnīyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1123: tathāpi teṣāṃ sādhanāṃśatvakalpane 'navasthāprasaṅgāt. yadi ca tatsāmarthyaṃ syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1124: tadā pakṣopanyāsamātrād eva sādhyāvagater hetur ānarthakyam aśnuvīta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1126: evaṃ hi tatsāmarthyaṃ siddhyen nānyathā. tasmād ya eva paranirapekṣaṃ sādhyaṃ bodhayati sa eva hetuḥ sādhanaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1129: ityādi yad uktaṃ tad yuktam uktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1134: anyathā dhvanim anuccārayan svārthānumāne sādhyam avabudhyata iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1135: tadanuccāraṇena paraniścayotpādanaṃ prasajyeta. na cāitad asti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1137: tadarthaṃ śabdāṅgīkaraṇe yena yena vinā parapratipādanāsambhavas tat tad urarīkartavyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1138: samānanyāyāt. na ca pakṣādivirahe pratipādyaviśeṣaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1139: hetugocarāditatsādhyārthapratītivikalatayā tasya sākāṅkṣatvāt. tathā ca bubhutsitārthabodhābhāvād apratyāyita eva tiṣṭhed;
GSP29snyayvpu:1140: atas tadbodhanārthaṃ pakṣādayo darśanīyā iti te 'pi sādhanāṃśāḥ syuḥ. yac coktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:1144: avipratārakatāniścitapuruṣavacanamātrād apy agnir atretyādirūpāt kvacit prameyo 'rthaḥ sidhyatīti hetor apy asādhanatāprasaṅgāt. tadviraheṇāpi sādhyasiddheḥ. yuktaṃ cāitad,
GSP29snyayvpu:1145: avipratārakavacanasya prāg eva prāmāṇyaprasādhanāt. yac coktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:1147: tadā pakṣamātrād eva sādhyapratīter hetor vaiyarthyaṃ syād iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1151: anyathā samarthatāyogāt. paścāt tasyāiva pramāṇena samarthanaṃ sarvatra gṛhītavyāptikasya ca punaḥ pakṣadharmiṇy upasaṃharaṇam anarthakatāṃ prāpnuvat kena nivāryeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:1154: pakṣādīn api virahayya pratipādyaviśeṣaḥ pratipādayituṃ na pāryata iti teṣām api sārthakatā na durupapādeti mucyatām āgrahaḥ. tasmād dhetuvat pakṣādayo 'pi sādhanaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1155: hetor api kvacit pratipādye tadapekṣatayā nirapekṣatāsiddher iti. tad idaṃ sakalam ākalayyoktaṃ tat pakṣādivacanātmakaṃ iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1156: [NAV_14.0] tad evam arthataḥ pakṣādīn prastutya tāvat pakṣalakṣaṇam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1162: prāśnikādīnāṃ purataḥ pratijñāsvīkāra ity arthaḥ. kim abhyupagamamātram?
GSP29snyayvpu:1163: nety āha: pratyakṣādyanirākṛta iti. pratyakṣaṃ sākṣātkāri saṃvedanam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1165: tair anirākṛto 'bādhitaḥ pakṣa iti sambandhaḥ. tad yathā -- '
GSP29snyayvpu:1168: ityādi vā. ayaṃ ca kevalam eṣṭavyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1169: na punaḥ parārthānumānakāle vacanenābhidhātavya iti yo manyeta taṃ pratyāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1170: tasya pakṣasya prayogo 'bhidhānam atra parārthānumānaprastāve kartavyo vidheyaḥ. kuta ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1176: na hi sarvatra prativādinaḥ prakramād eva nirṇītapakṣasya kūrcaśobhāpuraḥsaraṃ hetur upanyasyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1178: [NAV_15.0] tato yadādyāpi pratipādyaḥ pakṣārthaṃ na jānīte,
GSP29snyayvpu:1179: tadākāṇḍa eva hetāv ucyamāne viṣayavyāmohād bhrāntilakṣaṇo doṣaḥ syād ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1181: pratyāyyasya bhaved dhetur viruddhārekito yathā // NA_15 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1182: [NAV_15.1] anyathety uktaviparītāśrayaṇe pakṣaprayogākaraṇa ity arthaḥ. vādino hetūpanyāsakartur abhipreto 'bhimataḥ sa cāsau hetugocaraś ca
GSP29snyayvpu:1183: tatra muhyati dolāyate tac chīlaś ca yas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1184: tasya pratyāyyasya prativādino hetur viruddhārekito bhaved virodhaśaṅkākalaṅkitaḥ syād ity arthaḥ. tataś ca samyagghetāv api '
GSP29snyayvpu:1187: pakṣopanyāsāt tu nirṇītahetugocarasya nāiṣa doṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ. amum evārthaṃ spaṣṭadṛṣṭāntenāha yatheti. tadupanyāsārthaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1190: [NAV_16.1] yathā lakṣyanirdeśaṃ vinā dhānuṣkasyeṣuṃ prakṣipato yau guṇadoṣau tau taddarśijanasya viparyastāv api pratibhātaḥ -- guṇo 'pi doṣatayā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1191: doṣo 'pi vā guṇatayā -- tathā pakṣanirdeśaṃ vinā hetum upanyasyato vādino yau svābhipretasādhyasādhanasamarthatvāsamarthatvalakṣaṇau
GSP29snyayvpu:1192: guṇadoṣau tau prāśnikaprativādyādīnāṃ viparītāv api pratibhāta iti bhāvārthaḥ. akṣarārthas
GSP29snyayvpu:1193: tu dhanuṣā carati dhānuṣkas tasya guṇo lakṣyavedhaprāvīṇyalakṣaṇas tatra prekṣakāṇāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1195: anyathā doṣo 'pi draṣṭavyaḥ. tatsamprekṣijanasya tatsamprekṣaṇaśīlalokasya parividhyato yathā -- kathañcid bāṇaṃ muñcata ity arthaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1196: dhanuṣkasya vinā lakṣyanirdeśena cāpadharasya vedhyaniṣṭaṅkanam ṛte yau guṇetarau guṇadoṣau tau yathā viruddhārekitau bhavatas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1197: tathā vādino 'pīty arthaḥ. tasmād avijñātatadarthe prativādini vādidhānuṣkeṇa pakṣalakṣyaṃ nirdiśyāiva hetuśaraḥ proktavya iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1205: hetos tathopapattyā vā syāt prayogo 'nyathāpi vā /
GSP29snyayvpu:1208: sāmastyena hetor vyāvṛttir evāikaṃ lakṣaṇam iti nirṇītam. parārthānumāne 'pi tad eva prakāśanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1209: vacanaracanā tu kvacit kathañcit pravartata ity abhiprāyavāṃs taddvaividhyam āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1210: hetor dvividhaḥ prayogaḥ syād iti sambandhaḥ. katham ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1214: dhūmasya tathāivopapatter iti. anyathāpi vety anenāvayave samudāyopacārād anyathānupapattiṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1215: lakṣayati. anyathā sādhyavyatireke 'nupapattir avidyamānatāiva tayā vānyathānupapattyā
GSP29snyayvpu:1219: ete ca dve apy ekasmin sādhye prayoktavye';
GSP29snyayvpu:1221: tacchiṣyaṇārthaṃ āhānyatareṇāpi tathopapattiprayogeṇānyathānupapattiprayogeṇa vā sādhyasya pratipipādayiṣitārthasya siddhir niṣpattiḥ pratipādyapratītāv ārohaṇaṃ bhaved,
GSP29snyayvpu:1230: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca. tatra sādharmyadṛṣṭāntam adhikṛtyāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1232: sādharmyeṇa sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ sambandhasmaraṇān mataḥ // NA_18 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1233: [NAV_18.1] dṛṣṭayor avalokitayoḥ sāmarthyāt sādhyasādhanayor antaḥ pariniṣṭhitiḥ anvayād vyatirekād vā sādhyasādhanabhāvavyavasthitinibandhanāsminn iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1234: samāno dharmo 'syeti sadharmā tadbhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena sādharmyeṇa. sa kiṃvidho bhavatīty āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1239: yatra kvacin niścīyatetarāṃ atiśayena nirṇīyate sa sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ. yathāgnir atra,
GSP29snyayvpu:1241: mahānasādivad iti. ayaṃ cāvismṛtapratibandhe prativādini na prayoktavya ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1245: nānyadā. yadā hi pratipādyo 'dyāpi sambandhaṃ sādhyāvinābhāvitvalakṣaṇaṃ nāvabudhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1248: na hi sahadarśanād eva kvacit sarvatredam amunā vinā na bhavatīti sidhyaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1249: atiprasaṅgāt. gṛhīte ca pratibandhe smaryamāṇe kevalaṃ hetur darśanīyaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1251: vaiyarthyāt. yadā tu gṛhīto 'pi vismṛtaḥ kathañcit sambandhas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1254: na tāvan nirṇayātmakam api pratyakṣaṃ deśakālāntarasaṃcariṣṇunoḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ sambandhaṃ nirīkṣituṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1255: sannihite 'rthe viśadādhyavasāyena pravṛtteḥ. nāpi śabdāt tannirṇayas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1259: tadasiddhāv anumānānutthānād iti. anumānāt sambandhagrahaṇe niravadhir anavasthānuṣajyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1260: sambandhagrāhiṇo 'py anumānasya punaḥ sambandhāntaragrahaṇasavyapekṣatvād iti. atrocyate -- pratyakṣānumāne dve eva pramāṇe iti yeṣāṃ mithyābhiniveśas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1264: tadvilope ca vicārānarthakyaprāpter iti. atra prakaraṇe punar anumānāt pārthakyenoho na darśitaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1270: khyāpyate yatra dṛṣṭānte vaidharmyeṇeti sa smṛtaḥ // NA_19 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1273: tena vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ. kīdṛśa ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1275: sa ca sādhanasyāpi gamakasyāpy asambhava evety atra draṣṭavyaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1276: khyāpyate pratipādyate yatra kvacid dṛṣṭānte sa vaidharmyeṇa bhavatītiśabdena sambandhasmaraṇād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1278: asyāpi smaryamāṇe sambandhe prayogāyogād iti kim arthaṃ vismṛtasambandha eva prativādini dṛṣṭāntaḥ prayujyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1281: vyarthā syāt tadasadbhāve 'py evaṃ nyāyavido viduḥ // NA_20 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1282: [NAV_20.1] anyadāhi smaryamāṇe vā sambandhe prayujyetāgṛhīte vā. yady ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1283: so 'yuktaḥ. yadā sarvatra sādhyāvinābhāvinaṃ hetuṃ smarati pratipādyas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1284: tadā pakṣe 'pi tam avabudhya kathaṃ sādhyaṃ na pratipadyeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:1285: tataś cāntaḥ pakṣamadhye vyāptiḥ sādhanasya sādhyākrāntatvam antarvyāptis,
GSP29snyayvpu:1286: tayāiva sādhyasya gamyasya siddheḥ pratīter bahir vivakṣitadharmiṇo 'nyatra dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇy udāhṛtir vyāptidarśanarūpā vyarthā niṣprayojanā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1287: tatpratyāyyārthābhāvād iti. dvitīyapakṣasyāpi nirdoṣatāṃ nirasyann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1288: tadasadbhāve 'py evaṃ sambandhāgrahaṇād antarvyāptyabhāve 'py evam iti vyarthāiva bahirudāhṛtiḥ. na hi sahadarśanāt kvacit sarvatra tadrūpatā
GSP29snyayvpu:1289: vyabhicāradarśanāt. tasmād agṛhītasambandhe pratipādye pramāṇena pratibandhaḥ sādhyaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1290: tatsiddhau tata eva sādhyasiddher akiñcitkarī dṛṣṭāntodāhṛtir iti nyāyavido nyāyavidvāṃso
GSP29snyayvpu:1291: vidur avabudhyanta iti. iha ca prakaraṇe śeṣāvayavānām upanayanigamanaśuddhipañcakalakṣaṇānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1294: tathāpy ata eva pratipāditāvayavatrayād buddhimadbhir unneyaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1295: yato 'vayavāpekṣayā jaghanyamadhyamotkṛṣṭās tisraḥ kathā bhavanti. tatra hetupratipādanamātraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1296: jaghanyā. dvyādyavayavanivedanaṃ madhyamā. sampūrṇadaśāvayavakathanam utkṛṣṭā. tatreha
GSP29snyayvpu:1297: madhyamāyāḥ sākṣāt kathanena jaghanyotkṛṣṭe arthataḥ sūcayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1299: [NAV_21.0] evaṃ pakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ heyajñāne saty upādeyaṃ viviktataraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1300: vedyata iti tadvyudastāḥ pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntābhāsā vaktavyāḥ. tatra tāvat pakṣalakṣaṇavyudastān pakṣābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1303: [NAV_21.1] pakṣasthānopanyastatvāt tatkāryākaraṇatvāc ca pakṣavad ābhāsata iti pakṣābhāsaḥ. asāv anekadhānekaprakāro mata iti sambandhaḥ. katham ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1304: pratipādyasya prativādino yaḥ kaścit siddhaḥ pratītāv ārūḍha eva sa pakṣābhāsaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1307: atiprasakteḥ. tathākṣaliṅgato 'dhyakṣahetubhyāṃ lokasvavacanābhyāṃ ca bādhitas tiraskṛto yaḥ sa pakṣābhāsaḥ. tatra pratipādyasiddho yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1312: parasparaviviktau vā sāmānyaviśeṣāv iti. anumānabādhito yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1316: [NAV_22.0] sāmprataṃ hetulakṣaṇaṃ smārayaṃs tadapāstān hetvābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1319: [NAV_22.1] hetor lakṣaṇam asādhāraṇadharmarūpaṃ yad īritaṃ gamitam anekārthatvād vā pratipāditaṃ svārthānumānaprastāve yad utānyathānupapannatvam iti tasyāpratītir anadhyavasāyaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1322: 'pratītiś ca sandehaś ca viparyāsaś ceti dvandvaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1325: tadābhatāābhānam ābhā tasyeva samyagghetor ivābhāsyeti tadābhas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1328: [NAV_23.0] adhunā yena lakṣaṇena yannāmā hetvābhāso bhavati tad darśayati:
GSP29snyayvpu:1330: viruddho yo 'nyathāpy atra yukto 'naikāntikaḥ sa tu // NA_23 //
GSP29snyayvpu:1331: [NAV_23.1] yaḥ kaścid apratītaḥ pratītyā agocarīkṛto 'niścitaḥ so 'siddhanāmā hetvābhāsaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1332: tuśabdas trayasyāpi bhedoddyotakaḥ. yas tv anyathāiva sādhyaṃ vināiva vipakṣa eveti yāvad,
GSP29snyayvpu:1333: upapadyate sambhavati sa viruddhābhidhānaḥ. yaḥ punar anyathāpi sādhyaviparyayeṇāpi yukto ghaṭamānako,
GSP29snyayvpu:1342: [NAV_23.2] tathā hy: anityāikānte tāvad asiddhāḥ sarva eva hetavaś,
GSP29snyayvpu:1347: tathāpi teṣāṃ sādhanatve sādhyam api niḥsvabhāvam iti kharaviṣāṇaṃ śaśaviṣāṇasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1348: sādhanam āpadyata iti śobhanaḥ sādhyasadhanavyavahāraḥ. sarva evāyam anumānānumeyavyavahāro
GSP29snyayvpu:1351: evaṃ tarhi cākṣuṣatvam api śabde buddhyādhyāropya hetutayocyamānaṃ nāsiddhatayodbhāvanīyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1360: vyavacchedikā vā buddhiḥ svāṃśamagnāpi bahirvastugrahaṇarūpatayā plavamānā?
GSP29snyayvpu:1361: nāparo vastudharmo yatra bhedābhedavikalpadvāreṇā dūṣaṇaṃ ditsur bhavān iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:1362: tarhi sa śabde nāstīti kāiṣā bhāṣā?
GSP29snyayvpu:1363: evaṃ hi nabhaḥpuṇḍarīkaṃ tatra nāstīti sattvādikam api kalpayituṃ na śakyam iti prasajyeta. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1364: te sādhanadharmā dharmiṇi bhavanto 'pi na bhavaddarśane pratītim ārohanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1366: taduttarakālabhāvinyā vāsanāprabodhajanyāyā vikalpabuddheḥ svāṃśagrahaṇaparyavasitaśarīratvena bahiḥsvalakṣaṇe praveśābhāvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1368: [NAV_23.3] nityāikānte 'pi dharmiṇo 'tyantavyatiriktānām apāramārthikānāṃ vā svasādhanadharmāṇāṃ pramāṇenāpratītatvād asiddhatā draṣṭavyā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1369: dharmiṇo 'vinirluṭhitarūpāṇāṃ pāramārthikānāṃ sakaladharmāṇāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhatvena nihnotum aśakyatvād iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1370: [NAV_23.4] tathā viruddhatāpi pakṣadvaye 'pi sarvasādhanadharmāṇām unneyānekāntapratibaddhasvabhāvatvena tatsādhanapravaṇatvāt. etac cottaratra
GSP29snyayvpu:1371: [NAV_23.5] evaṃ pakṣadvaye 'pi nirdiśyamānāḥ sarva eva hetavo 'naikāntikatām ātmasātkurvanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1374: [NAV_23.6] tathā hi: anityavādī nityavādinaṃ prati pramāṇayati. sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1378: tato 'rthakriyā vyāvartamānā svakroḍīkṛtāṃ sattāṃ vyāvartayed iti kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ. na hi nityo 'rtho 'rthakriyāyāṃ krameṇa pravartitum utsahate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1382: atādavasthyasyānityalakṣaṇatvāt. nityo 'pi kramavartinaṃ sahakārikāraṇam artham udīkṣamāṇas tāvad asīt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1383: paścāt tam āsādya krameṇa kāryaṃ kuryād iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1385: akiñcitkarasyāpi pratīkṣaṇe 'navasthāprasaṅgāt. nāpi yaugapadyena nityo 'rtho 'rthakriyāṃ kurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:1386: 'dhyakṣavirodhāt. na hy ekakālaṃ sakalāḥ kriyāḥ prārabhamāṇaḥ kaścid upalabhate; karotu vā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1387: tathāpy ādyakṣaṇa eva sakalakriyāparisamāpter dvitīyādikṣaṇeṣv akurvāṇasyānityatā balād āḍhaukate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1390: sarvaṃ nityaṃ sattvāt. kṣaṇike sadasatkālayor arthakriyāvirodhāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1392: tato nivartamānam ananyaśaraṇatayā nityatvaṃ sādhayati. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1397: sakalabhāvānāṃ parasparaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaprāptyātiprasaṅgāc ca. nāpi dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1400: [NAV_23.8] tad evam ekāntadvaye 'pi ye ye hetavas te te yukteḥ samānatayā viruddhaṃ na vyabhicaranty;
GSP29snyayvpu:1402: sarvavastudharmāṇāṃ vastuto 'nekāntapratibaddhatvād iti. tasmād amī sarva eva hetavaḥ santo 'nekāntam antareṇa nopapadyanta iti tam eva pratipādayitum
GSP29snyayvpu:1403: vimūḍhabuddhibhiḥ punaḥ vipakṣasādhanārtham upanyasyamānā vivakṣayāsiddhaviruddhānaikāntikatām ābibhratīti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1404: [NAV_24.0] tad evaṃ hetvābhāsān pratipādya dṛṣtāntalakṣaṇavyudastān dṛṣṭāntābhāsān āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1407: [NAV_24.1] sādhanaṃ sādhyākrāntam upadarśayitum abhipretaṃ yasmiṃs tat sādharmyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1409: dūṣyanta iti doṣāḥ. dṛṣṭāntā eva doṣā dṛṣṭāntadoṣāḥ dṛṣṭāntābhāsā ity arthaḥ. nyāyavidīritā vidvadbhir gaditāḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1412: tadvikalās tacchūnyāḥ. ādiśabdāt sandigdhasādhyasādhanobhayadharmā gṛhyante. kiṃbhūtā ete ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1427: taducchede ca pramāṇaprameyābhāvān na kiñcit kenacit sādhyata iti bhrāntavādino mūkatāpanipadyeta. sādhanavikalo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1434: ghaṭavad; ghaṭasya sattvāt pratyakṣādibhir upalabdhatvāc ca. sandigdhasādhyadharmo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1439: viśiṣṭacetodharmāṇāṃ viśiṣṭavyāhārādiliṅgagamyatvād rathyāpuruṣe tannirṇayasyāpy abhāvād iti. sandigdhasādhanadharmo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1445: vītarāgasyāpi tathā sambhavād iti. sandigdhobhayadharmo yathāsarvajño 'yaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1449: [NAV_24.3] nanu ca parair anyad api dṛṣṭāntābhāsatrayam uktam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1450: tad yathānanvayo 'pradarśitānvayo viparītānvayaś ceti. tatrānanvayo yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1453: iṣṭapuruṣavad iti. yady api kileṣṭapuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ vaktṛtvaṃ ca sādhyasādhanadharmau dṛṣṭau,
GSP29snyayvpu:1454: tathāpi yo yo vaktā sa sa rāgādimān iti vyāptyasiddher ananvayo 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ. tathāpradarśitānvayo yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1456: ghaṭavad iti. atra yady api vāstavo 'nvayo 'sti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1457: tathāpi vādinā vacanena na prakāśita ity apradarśitānvayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ. viparitānvayo yathānityaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1458: kṛtakatvād iti hetum abhidhāya yad anityaṃ tad kṛtakaṃ ghaṭavad iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1461: iha tu viparyāsadarśanād viparītatā. tad etad bhavadbhiḥ kasmān noktam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1462: [NAV_24.4] atrocyate -- pareṣāṃ na suparyālocitam etad dṛṣṭāntābhāsatrayābhidhānam iti jñāpanārtham. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1463: na tāvad ananvayo dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavitum arhati. yadi hi dṛṣṭāntabalena vyāptiḥ sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratipādyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1470: pratibandhābhāve cānvayāsiddheḥ. na ca hetudoṣo 'pi dṛṣṭānte vācyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1471: 'tiprasaṅgād iti. tathāpradarśitānvayaviparītānvayāv api na dṛṣṭāntābhāsatāṃ svīkuruto,
GSP29snyayvpu:1474: vaktṛdoṣāṇāmānantyāt. vaktṛdoṣatve 'pi parārthānumāne tatkauśalam apekṣata iti. evaṃ copanyāse na bubhutsitārthasādhakāv ato dṛṣṭāntābhāsāv etāv iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:1475: evaṃ tarhi karaṇāpāṭavādayo 'pi dṛṣṭāntābhāsā vācyāḥ. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:1477: vispaṣṭavarṇāgrahaṇe vyaktatayā tadarthāvagamābhāvād ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:1478: [NAV_25.0] tad evaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntābhāsān pratipādya vaidharmyeṇāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1481: [NAV_25.1] sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvavyāptau darśayitum abhipreto yasmiṃs tad vaidharmyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1482: tenātra dṛṣṭāntadoṣā nyāyavidīritā iti dattārtham. sādhyasādhanayugmānāṃ gamyagamakobhayānām anivṛtter anivartanāc,
GSP29snyayvpu:1483: caśabdasya vyavahitaprayogatvāt saṃśayāc ca nivṛttisandehāc cety arthaḥ. tad anena ṣaḍ dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ sūcitās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1493: yat punar bhrāntaṃ na bhavati na tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1495: svapnajñānād bhrāntatānivṛtteḥ sādhyāvyatirekitvam iti. sādhanāvyatirekī yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1498: yat punaḥ savikalpakaṃ na tat pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1500: anumānāt pramāṇatānivṛtteḥ sādhanāvyatirekitvam iti. ubhayāvyatirekī yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1503: yaḥ punar na nityānityaḥ sa na san,
GSP29snyayvpu:1505: ghaṭād ubhayasyāpy avyāvṛtter ubhayāvyatirekitvam iti. tathā sandigdhasādhyavyatireko yathāsarvajñā anāptā vā kapilādayo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1507: yaḥ punaḥ sarvajña āpto vā 'sāv āryasatyacatuṣṭayaṃ pratyapīpadat,
GSP29snyayvpu:1508: tad yathā -- śauddhodanir iti. ayaṃ ca sādhyāvyatirekī vāryasatyacatuṣṭayasya duḥkhasamudayamārganirodhalakṣaṇasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1515: kartuṃ śakyatvāt. tasmāc chauddhodaneḥ sakāśād asarvajñatānāptatālakṣaṇasya sādhyasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1516: vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdheti sandigdhasādhyavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhanavyatireko yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1517: 'nādeyavākyaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimattvād iti. atra vaidharmyadṛṣṭānto:
GSP29snyayvpu:1520: tad yathā -- sugata iti. yady api taddarśanānuraktāntaḥkaraṇāṇāṃ sugatasyādeyavacanatā siddhisaudhamadhyārūḍhā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1522: ataḥ sugatād rāgādimattāvyāvṛttisaṃśayāt sandigdhasādhanavyatirekitvam iti. sandigdhasādhyasādhanavyatireko yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1525: ye punar vītarāgās te karuṇāspadeṣu karuṇāparītacittatayā dattanijamāṃsaśakalās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1526: tad yathā -- bodhisattvā iti. atra sādhyasādhanadharmayor bodhisattvebhyo vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā;
GSP29snyayvpu:1527: tatpratipādakapramāṇavaikalyān na jñāyate kiṃ te rāgādimanta uta vītarāgāḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1528: tathānukampyeṣu kiṃ svapiśitakhaṇḍāni dattavanto neti vā. ataḥ sandigdhasādhyasādhanavyatirekitvam iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1529: [NAV_25.3] parair apare 'pi dṛṣṭāntābhāsās trayo 'vimṛśyabhāṣitayā darśitāḥ. tad yathā -- avyatireko,
GSP29snyayvpu:1531: viparītavyatirekaś ceti. te 'smābhir ayuktatvān na darśayitavyāḥ. tathā hy:
GSP29snyayvpu:1537: yathopalakhaṇḍa iti. yady api kilopalakhaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1538: tathāpi vyāptyā vyatirekāsiddher avyatirekitvam iti. ayuktaś cāyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29snyayvpu:1539: avyatirekitāyā hetudoṣatvāt. yadi hi dṛṣṭāntabalenāiva vyatirekaḥ pratipādyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1542: prākpravṛttasambandhagrahaṇapravaṇapramāṇagocarasmaraṇasampādanārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntopādānāt. na hy ekatra yo yadabhāve na dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1543: sa tadabhāve na bhavatīti pratibandhagrāhipramāṇavyatirekeṇa sidhyaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1544: atiprasaṅgāt. tasmād asiddhapratibandhasya hetor evāyaṃ doṣo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1550: ākāśavad iti. atra vidyamāno 'pi vyatireko vādinā vacanena nodbhāvita iti duṣṭatā. viparītavyatirekaḥ punar abhihito,
GSP29snyayvpu:1554: yathākāśam iti. atra viparyastavyatirekapradarśanād viparītavyatirekitvam. vaidharmyaprayoge hi sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāvākrānto darśanīyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1557: [NAV_25.4] vyatirekāpradarśanaṃ viparītavyatirekapradarśanaṃ ca na vastuno doṣaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1560: yad uta svārthānumānakāle svayaṃ hetudarśanamātrāt sādhyapratīteḥ parārthānumānāvasare
GSP29snyayvpu:1561: 'pi hetupratipādanam eva kartavyaṃ “viduṣāṃ vācyo hetur eva hi kevala” itivacanāt teṣāṃ '
GSP29snyayvpu:1563: itīyatā hetūpanyāsenāiva sisādhayiṣitasādhyasiddheḥ samastadṛṣṭāntābhāsavarṇanam api pūrvāparavyāhatavacanaracanācāturyam āvirbhāvayati.āsātāṃ tāvad etau,
GSP29snyayvpu:1565: anvayavyatirekāparijñāne pratipādyasya na dṛṣṭāntam antareṇāitau darśayituṃ śakyāv,
GSP29snyayvpu:1574: [NAV_26.0] tad evaṃ parārthānumānaṃ vyācakṣāṇena yad uktaṃ -- yad uta “tat pakṣādivacanātmakam” iti -- tat pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntānāṃ sābhāsānāṃ pratipādanāt prāyaḥ paryantitaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1575: kevalaṃ tat paroktadūṣaṇoddhārād eva samīcīnatām ābibhartīty amunā prastāvena dūṣaṇaṃ sābhāsam abhidhātukāma āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1580: sādhane; sādhyate pratipādyapratītāv āropyate 'numeyaṃ yena tat sādhanam. tac cānekarūpaṃ prāk pratyapādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:1588: tatpratyāyanopāyasya ca sādhanatvād iti. tatreha samyaksādhanasya dūṣayitum aśakyatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1590: sādhanābhāsam eva dūṣanopanipātāt prāg avasthāyām anirjñātaṃ sāmānyena sādhanadhvaninoktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1592: udbhāvanaṃ prāśnikānāṃ purataḥ prakāśanaṃ yat tad dūṣyate svābhipretasādhyapratyāyanavaikalyalakṣaṇāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1593: vikṛtiṃ nīyate sādhanam aneneti dūṣaṇam iti jñeyam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1595: nirgataṃ samyakprayuktatvād avadyaṃ pāpaṃ pakṣādidoṣalakṣaṇaṃ dauṣṭyam asmād iti niravadyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1596: tasmin sādhane vādinokta iti vartate. tathāpi matsaritayā pramṛdyodaraṃ yad avidyamānānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1597: doṣāṇām udbhāvanaṃ tad dūṣaṇasthānopanyastatvāt tatkāryākaraṇāt samyaksādhane doṣodbhāvanasya
GSP29snyayvpu:1599: tad eva nāma saṃjñā yasya tattathā. samarthasādhanopanyāsatvāt sādhite sādhye satām
GSP29snyayvpu:1600: apy apaśabdālaṅkārādidoṣāṇāṃ yad udbhāvanaṃ tad api dūṣaṇābhāsanāmakam iti. tuśabdena
GSP29snyayvpu:1607: lakṣaṇaṃ pratipādyādhunā yaiḥ pāramārthikaṃ samastāvaraṇavicchedalabhyam aśeṣārthagocaraṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1615: sakalaṃ ca tad avāraṇaṃ ca sakalāvaraṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1617: ātmā svarūpaṃ yasya tattathā. ata eva kevalam asahāyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1619: sāmastyena punar āvaraṇanirdalane vibandhakakāraṇavaikalyād ekākāratayāiva tasya vivartanāt. ato jñānāntaranirapekṣaṃ yat prakāśate prathate nirupādhikaṃ dyotata ity arthaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1620: tat paramārthataḥ pratyakṣam. tad idaṃ sakalāvaraṇamuktātmetihetudvāreṇa tathā kevalaṃ yat prakāśata itisvarūpato nirūpyādhunā kāryadvāreṇa nirūpayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1621: sakalārthātmanāṃ samastavastusvarūpāṇāṃ satatapratibhāsanam anavarataprakāśanaṃ sakalārthātmasatatapratibhāsanam iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:1623: ātmano dharmarūpatayā bhedavadvivakṣitaṃ jñānam iti yāvat. asya ca pāramārthikatvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1626: tataś cākṣaṃ prati vartata iti pratyakṣaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1627: yatrātmanaḥ sākṣād vyāpāraḥ. vyāvahārikaṃ punar indriyavyavahitātmavyāpārasampādyatvāt paramārthataḥ parokṣam eva:
GSP29snyayvpu:1630: [NAV_27.2] nanu ca prasiddhaṃ lakṣyam anūdyāprasiddhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vidhīyate -- sarvatrāyaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1631: nyāyaḥ. aprasiddhe punar lakṣye lakṣaṇam abhidhīyamānam ambarāravindinīkusumalakṣaṇavan
GSP29snyayvpu:1632: nirgocaratāṃ yāyāt. tad idaṃ svarūpato 'prasādhya lakṣaṇam abhidadhānasya ko 'bhiprāya ity;
GSP29snyayvpu:1633: atrocyate -- ye ye mithyāvalepādhmātāntaḥkaraṇāḥ pramāṇaprasiddham apy adaḥ prati vipratipadyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:1634: teṣāṃ dhyāndhīkṛtabuddhitvād avadhāraṇīyatām anena darśayati. kim asya pratipādakaṃ pramāṇam iti ced, ete brūmaḥ:
GSP29snyayvpu:1638: tasya tasya grāhakaṃ kiñcit pratyakṣam udayapadavīṃ samāsādayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1641: atas tadavalokinā viśadadarśanenāpi bhāvyam iti. sarvārthaviṣayaṃ kim anumānaṃ pravartata iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:1643: iha yad yad asti tat tat sarvaṃ sthityudayāpavargasaṃsargam anubhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1644: vastutvāt; yad yad vastu tat tat sthemajanmapralayaiḥ kroḍīkṛtaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1647: ataḥ prastutatrayākrāntaṃ tad avagantavyam. idam eva nikhilārthagocaram anekāntānumānaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1649: na cānumānapravṛttāv apy anarthitvādinā pramātur apravṛttāv anumeyagocarapratyakṣāsambhavena
GSP29snyayvpu:1651: sambhavasya sādhyatayābhipretatvāt. na ca sambhavamātre 'sti vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1656: iha yo yo vidyamānaśuddhyupāyaḥ sa sa sambhavatsamastaśuddhiko;
GSP29snyayvpu:1658: tathā ca vidyamānajñānādyabhyāsaśuddhyupāya ātmātaḥ sambhavatsamastaśuddhika iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1659: sāmastyaśuddhaś cātmā jñānajñāninoḥ kathañcid abhedāt kevalam abhidhīyata iti. jñānādyabhyāsaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:1661: āvaraṇamalapratipakṣarūpatvād iti brūmaḥ. pratipakṣarūpatā katham avadhāriteiti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:1665: tadatiśaye punaḥ sāmastyocchedaḥ syād ity abhidadhmahe. etena yat pare procur -- yathā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1669: pramāṇapañcakaṃ tadgocaraṃ na pravartata iti kathaṃ bhavato nirṇayaḥ?
GSP29snyayvpu:1672: tato yathā ghaṭādeḥ kvacit pramāṇapañcakaṃ tadgocaraṃ nirvartamānam abhāvaṃ sādhayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:1673: evaṃ samastavastusaṃvedanagocaram api tan nivartamānaṃ niyatadeśadaśāvacchinnam abhāvaṃ sādhayen,
GSP29snyayvpu:1675: tataś ca ghaṭādivat tad durnivāraṃ syāt. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣo,
GSP29snyayvpu:1678: yad uta na kvacit samastārthasaṃvedanaṃ astīti -- na bhavatas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1679: tathāvidhapuruṣasambhavānabhyupagamāt. itarathā ya eva kaścin niścityāivam abhidadhyāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1680: sa eva samastavastuvistāravyāpijñānāloka iti samastārthagocarasaṃvedanasiddhir ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:1681: [NAV_28.0] tad evaṃ pramāṇaviṣaye lakṣaṇasaṃkhyāvipratipattī nirākṛtyādhunā kramaprāptāṃ gocaravipratipattiṃ bahuvaktavyatvād anirākṛtya tāvat phalavipratipattiṃ nirācikīrṣur āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1685: sākṣād asākṣāc cānantaraṃ vyavahitaṃ cety arthaḥ. tatra sākṣād ajñānam anadhyavasāyaḥ prameyāparicchittis tasya vinivartanaṃ viśeṣeṇa pralayāpādanaṃ pramāṇasya phalam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1687: tasya ca sarvānarthamūlatayā pramātrapakāritvāt. tannivartanasya prayojanatā yuktāiva.
GSP29snyayvpu:1688: etac cānantaraprayojanaṃ sarvajñānānām ekarūpatvāt sāmānyenoktam. vyavahitaprayojanaṃ punar vibhāgenāha:
GSP29snyayvpu:1691: te sukhopekṣe phalam ity arthaḥ. śeṣasya tadvyatiriktaprākṛtalokapramāṇasyādānaṃ grahaṇaṃ hānaṃ parityāgas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1693: sā phalam iti yāvat. tataś cādeyānāṃ samyagdarśanādisrakcandanādīnāṃ yāditsā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1694: tathā heyānāṃ mithyādarśanādiviṣakaṇṭakādīnāṃ yā jihāsā sā pramāṇasādhyāpramāṇāt tadasiddheḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1695: prekṣāpūrvakāriṇāṃ tataḥ pravṛttyayogād ity uktaṃ bhavati.
GSP29snyayvpu:1699: [NAV_29.1] aneke bahavo 'ntā aṃśā dharmā vātmānaḥ svarūpāṇi yasya tad anekāntātmakam. kiṃ tat?
GSP29snyayvpu:1702: sarvasaṃvidāṃ samastasaṃvittīnām. anenānekāntam antareṇa saṃvedanaprasaravyavacchedaṃ darśayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1704: kevalaṃ keṣucid aṃśeṣu visaṃvādakatvād apramāṇāni tāni saṅgīryante. tad ayam abhiprāyo:
GSP29snyayvpu:1705: yadā saṃvedanasāmānyam apy anekāntaviraheṇa na pravartitum utsahate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1706: tadā tadviśeṣabhūtaṃ pramāṇam ekānte pravartiṣyata iti dūrāpāstāvakāśāivāiṣā vārtā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1707: tathāpy anādimithyābhiniveśavāsitāntaḥkaraṇāḥ kudarśanavipralabdhabuddhayo bahavo 'tra vipratipadyanta iti sarvapramāṇānām anekāntagocaratvasādhakaṃ pramāṇam abhidhīyate:
GSP29snyayvpu:1712: tad -- yathā nirādīnavanayanaprabhavadarśane pratibhāsamānaṃ pāṭalatayā japākusumaṃ tathāiva tadgocaratayābhyupagamyate;
GSP29snyayvpu:1713: parasparāvibhaktānekasvabhāvākrāntamūrtikaṃ ca bahir antaś ca vastu sarvapramāṇeṣu prathata ity;
GSP29snyayvpu:1715: [NAV_29.2] na cetaretaraviśakalitadharmidharmabhāvavādibhiḥ kaṇabhakṣākṣapādaśiṣyakais tāvad asya hetor asiddhatādidoṣaḥ pratipādayituṃ śakyas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1717: ekasmin dharmiṇi bahavo dharmās tato bhinnatanavaḥ kathaṃ varteran?
GSP29snyayvpu:1718: bhedāviśeṣeṇa sarvatra tadvṛttiprasaṅgāt. tatrāiva teṣāṃ samavāyān nānyatra vartanta iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:1719: nanu so 'pi samavāyo yady upakāryopakārakabhāvavyatirekeṇāpi bhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1724: tadvirahe 'nekopakārakatvābhāvāt. na hi yena svabhāvenāikasyopakaroti tenāiva dvitīyasya,
GSP29snyayvpu:1731: tās tarhi tatra kathaṃ vartanta iti vācyam. samavāyād ityuttare 'sāv apy upakāryopakārakabhāvam
GSP29snyayvpu:1732: antareṇa kathaṃ na sarvatreti prācīnaṃ codyaṃ paścāllagnam anudhāvati. upakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagame
GSP29snyayvpu:1733: punar apy anekasvabhāvatāpradarśitayukteḥ punaḥ śaktyupakārakabhinnaśaktiparikalpane tad evāvartate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1734: tan na bhinnadharmaparikalpane 'py anekāntān mokṣa iti varam ādāv eva matsaritāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:1735: vihāyānekadharmādhyāsitaṃ vastv abhyupagatam. kiṃ bhedakalpanayāsthāna evātmanā parikleśiteneti.
GSP29snyayvpu:1743: bhinnāḥ khalu saṃyogādayaḥ saṃyogyādibhyo vikalpayituṃ pāryante -- yad uta katham eta eteṣu vartanta iti?
GSP29snyayvpu:1747: teṣāṃ niravayavatvābhyupagamāt. sāvayavatve 'pi tebhyo 'vayavebhyo yady abhinnās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1749: ekasyānekāvayavatvaprāpteḥ. atha bhinnās teṣv api te kathaṃ vartanta ity vācyam:
GSP29snyayvpu:1750: ekadeśena sāmastyena vā. ekadeśapakṣe tad evāvartata ity anavasthā. atha sāmastyena,
GSP29snyayvpu:1752: pratyekaṃ parisamāptatayā saṃyogādibahutvaprasaṅgāt. tadabhinnāḥ punaḥ saṃyogādayo na vikalpabhājo bhavanti. abhedapakṣe 'pi saṃyogādimātraṃ saṃyogyādimātraṃ vā syād iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1754: kiṃ tarhy anyonyāviśliṣṭasvarūpā vivakṣayā sandarśanīyabhedāḥ sarva evāite 'bhyupagamyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:1760: [NAV_29.3] etenāsya hetoḥ kāpilā apy asiddhatādidoṣam abhidhitsavo maukyam ānītāḥ. tathā hy:
GSP29snyayvpu:1765: paryāyabhrāntijanakaḥ punar vivarto 'pāramārthika iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1766: dvayor api sarvapramāṇeṣu prakāśamānayor abādhitayoḥ sarvavyavahāranibandhanayoḥ pakṣapātam antareṇāikasya nihnotum aśakyatvāt. tathā sati vivarta eva tāttviko,
GSP29snyayvpu:1767: dravyaṃ punar alīkam iti paryāyapakṣapātī prasañjayan durniṣedhaḥ syād iti. athettham abhidadhīthā:
GSP29snyayvpu:1770: tad ayuktam. yadi nāma dravyam abhedarūpatvāt sarvatrānuvartate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1774: na hi nīlaṃ pītarūpatāṃ na bibhartītyetāvatā tad asatyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1786: ākāśakusumavad itītaro 'pi pramāṇayan kena vāryeta. tan na pakṣadvaye 'pi kācid viśeṣopalabdhir
GSP29snyayvpu:1788: tathā cānyasyābhāvāt tad eva tadgocara iti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:1789: [NAV_29.4] tathā sugatamatānusāriṇām api madhye sautrāntikas tāvad asya hetor asiddhatām āvirbhāvayituṃ notsahate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1792: yathā rūpaṃ svottarakṣaṇaṃ svāvagāhijñānādikaṃ ca yugapaj janayati. yadi cāikakṣaṇavartinaḥ sāmagrībhedena bhedam anubhavata eva bhinnadeśanānākāryakāritā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1793: tathā sati nityapakṣoditaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ svamastakopanipāti syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1794: tasyāpi tathāiva bhinnakālakāryanirvartane 'pi bhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt. tathā pratibhāsabhedena kṣaṇakṣayirūpādisvalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvābhyupagamaś cāivaṃ nirnibandhanaḥ syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1796: kiṃ cāyam ekaṃ svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ sākṣāl lakṣayan kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇāni
GSP29snyayvpu:1799: lakṣitasya cālakṣitavyatirekanirākaraṇatas tādātmyaṃ kathayan svagirānekāntāvabhāsaṃ samarthayate. tathā hy:
GSP29snyayvpu:1808: abhinnayogakṣematvād. yugapadbhāvināṃ saṃvidantarniviṣṭākārāṇām ekatvaṃ na harṣādīnāṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1811: tadekatayā sitapītādiṣu jñānasya bodharūpeṇāivāviśiṣṭatvāt. tad evaṃ bahir antaś
GSP29snyayvpu:1815: ekasyāpi jñānasyānekavedyavedakākāratayā prathanopagateḥ. ekayogakṣematvāt tadaikyam iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1816: yugapadudayapralayavatāṃ sahavedināṃ sakalasantānānām ekatvaprasaṅgāt. saṃvṛtidarśitatvād anekatvasya,
GSP29snyayvpu:1819: yato 'nādyavidyābalād ekam akramaṃ sacetanaṃ svasaṃvedanasākṣātkṛtam api brahmānekaṃ kramavac cetanācetanaṃ parokṣāparokṣaṃ lakṣyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1820: bhavatparikalpitagrāhyagrāhakākāraviviktasaṃvedanavad iti tenāpi na durupapādam. astu vāyam anekāntāvabhāso bhrāntas,
GSP29snyayvpu:1822: tallakṣaṇe sakalāsumatām adhunāiva muktatāvāpteḥ. lakṣyate ca tat kathañcid,
GSP29snyayvpu:1823: itarathā suṣuptadaśāvat sarvavyavahārocchedaprasaṅgād ity ekasyāpi saṃvedanasya lakṣitālakṣitatvenānekāntapratibhāso
GSP29snyayvpu:1824: duḥśako 'pahnotum iti jñānavādy apy asya hetor asiddhatāvirbhāvanaṃ prati tūṣṇīm āsīta.
GSP29snyayvpu:1825: [NAV_29.6] śūnyavādinaḥ samastābhāvād asiddho 'nekāntaprakāśa iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:1827: anyathāpramāṇakaṃ sarvaṃ sarvatra vidyata iti parasyāpi vadato na vadanabhaṅgaḥ syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1828: tadabhyupagame 'bhyupagamakṣatiḥ. tayoś ca darśitavad anekāntaprakāśa iti nāsiddho
GSP29snyayvpu:1832: abhrāntaprakāśo hi tadabhyupagatihetuḥ. athāyam apītaretaravinirluṭhitaparamāṇukṣaṇakṣayibodhena bādhyamānatvād bhrānta ity ācakṣīthās,
GSP29snyayvpu:1834: yatas tadbodhaḥ kim upalabdhimātram yad vā nirṇayaḥ?
GSP29snyayvpu:1840: tathā sati sarvaṃ nirvikalpakam apramāṇatām aśnuvīta. na ca nirṇayo 'nekāntaprakāśaṃ bādhate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1842: bahir antaś ca tathāiva tadvijṛmbhaṇāt. atha sarvathā vastugrahaṇe 'pi nirvikalpakaṃ yatrāṃśe pāścātyaṃ vyavahārakārivyavasāyam upajanayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1844: tathā sati yadanantaram arthakriyāsamarthārthaprārthanayā puruṣaḥ pravartate sa eva nirṇayaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ svīkuryān,
GSP29snyayvpu:1846: tajjanakatve 'pi sannikarṣādivad ity āsajyeta. nirvikalpakam anadhigatārthādhigantṛtvāt pramāṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1849: nānumiter api tadvad aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt. na ca viparītākāranirākaraṇacaturatayānumitir viśeṣavatī,
GSP29snyayvpu:1851: asamāropaviṣaye 'pravṛtteḥ. trirūpaliṅgajatayā viśeṣo 'numiter mānatāsādhaka iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:1852: sākṣād anubhavād utpādas tarhi nirṇīter mahāparādha iti bhavato bālatām īkṣāmahe. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1853: yathā nirvikalpakam alakṣitaṃ sakalavyāvṛttasvalakṣaṇagrahaṇapravaṇam api katicidaṃśaviṣayaṃ vikalpam utthāpayati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1854: tathārtha evendriyālokādisannikṛṣṭatayā katicinnijāṃśaviṣayaṃ sākṣādviśadavikalpaṃ janayed iti kim ajāgalastanakalpanirvikalpakakalpanayā?
GSP29snyayvpu:1856: pāṭavāpāṭavādayo darśane 'py ekasmin na virudhyanta iti kiṃ rājñām ājñā?
GSP29snyayvpu:1857: tasmān na kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇasvalakṣaṇalakṣakaṃ kvacit kadācid darśanaṃ lakṣayanti bhavanto 'pi,
GSP29snyayvpu:1858: kevalaṃ svadarśanānuraktāntaḥkaraṇatayā na tadasattāṃ pratipadyante. svāṃśavyāpinaṃ kālāntarānuyāyinam ekaṃ bahir antaś cārthaṃ bodhaṃ ca prakāśayan prathamāno nirṇayaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1859: na punar nirmūlakaiḥ kuyuktivikalpair bādhyata iti na bhrāntaḥ. kiṃ cāsya bhrāntatāṃ kathayan sarvapramāṇaprameyavyavasthām unmūlyati. tathā
GSP29snyayvpu:1860: yat sattvabodharūpatvasukhatvādiṣu pramāṇaṃ tad eva kṣaṇakṣayitvasvargaprāpaṇaśaktiyuktatvādiṣv apramāṇam;
GSP29snyayvpu:1861: tathā yad vastu nīlacaturasrordhvatādirūpatayā prameyaṃ tad eva madhyabhāgakṣaṇavivartādināprameyaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:1862: tathā yad bahirarthāpekṣayā savikalpakaṃ svapnādidarśanaṃ vā bhrāntaṃ tad eva svarūpāpekṣayābhrāntam;
GSP29snyayvpu:1863: tathā yan niśīthinīnāthadvayādikaṃ dvitve 'līkaṃ tad api dhavalatāniyatadeśacāritādāv analīkam iti nirṇayaḥ. yadi tu virodhād bibhyadbhir bhavadbhir ayam apahnūyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:1864: kim aparam aikāntikaṃ pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ corarīkṛtya svākūtaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur iti sakautukaṃ naś cetaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:1865: [NAV_29.7] atha jñānavādy advaitaprakāśam alakṣitam abhyupetya tena bāhuvidhyaṃ dadhāno bodho bādhyamānatvād bhrānta ity abhidadhyāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:1868: alakṣitanirvikalpadarśanasya ca prāg eva pratikṣiptatvāt. atha yuktir bodhasya vaividhyaṃ bādheta,
GSP29snyayvpu:1871: advayaṃ saṃvedanaṃ viviktayuktyā prakāśamānam anādikālālīnavāsanāsamupajanitasaṃvṛtidarśitasattākaṃ sitāsitādivividhapratibhāsaṃ nirākurute. atra pratividadhmahe:
GSP29snyayvpu:1872: kim ayam anekākāro bodho 'dvayasaṃvedanād vyatyaraikṣīd vā na vā. kiṃ cāto,
GSP29snyayvpu:1874: katham adṛṣṭatatkāryatve vyatirikto 'yaṃ tad advayaṃ saṃvedanam anumāpayet?
GSP29snyayvpu:1875: avyatirekapakṣe punar anekaḥ sann ekasaṃvedanatādātmyena prathamānaḥ katham advaitaṃ noddalayet?
GSP29snyayvpu:1876: atha saṃvṛtidarśitatvād alīkatayāsya sitāsitādyākārabahirmukhakāluṣyasya bodhena tāttvikena saha bhedābhedavikalpānupapattir iti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:1879: sarvatrāvyabhicārād iti bruvāṇo durnivāraḥ syāt. jaḍasya prakāśāyogāt saṃvittiḥ satyā,
GSP29snyayvpu:1882: nādvaitam iti pratijānīmahe. saṃvṛtyādvayasyāpi nānāpratibhāso 'viruddha iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:1883: anādyavidyābalāj jaḍasyāpi cetanatayā prakāśo na viruddha iti parasyāpi śaṭhottaraṃ nātidurlabhaṃ bhavet. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:1884: nānākārakaluṣitacaitanyasāmānyasyānyathānupapattisāmarthyatas tasya siddhatvād advayaṃ saṃvedanam asiddhaṃ sādhayed ayam,
GSP29snyayvpu:1886: tathā ca sthirasthūrādyupalakṣitārthāṃśavaśād viśakalitaparamāṇukṣaṇakṣayiparyāyatādātmyaṃ sādhayan tam anekāntavādinaṃ na pratikṣeptum arhati,
GSP29snyayvpu:1888: yo 'yaṃ sitapītādyanekākāranirṇayo 'sāv api svasaṃvedanāpekṣayādvayarūpa iti bhavadabhiprāyo;
GSP29snyayvpu:1889: yathā cānavasthābhīrutayā sarvaṃ jñānaṃ svaprakāśam abhyupetaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:1894: yato “niścayair yan na niścīyate rūpaṃ tat teṣāṃ viṣayaḥ katham” iti svayam eva svavadhāya
GSP29snyayvpu:1895: pralapitam. tathā cādvayasya kṣaṇakṣayiṇaḥ svarūpasya tair grahaṇe viparītāropābhāvād
