GSP29snyayvpu:2153: pūrdāraṇāt purandara ityādi bhinnārthatvaṃ sarvaśabdānāṃ darśayati;
GSP29snyayvpu:2157: iha ye ye prativibhaktavyutpattinimittakās te te bhinnārthāḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2160: ato 'bhinnārthā iti. yat punar avicāritapratītibalād ekārthābhidhāyakatvaṃ pratipādyate tad ayuktam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2162: yadi yuktiriktā pratītir eva śaraṇīkriyate tadā mandamandaprakāśe davīyasi deśe sanniviṣṭaśarīrā
GSP29snyayvpu:2163: vibhinnā api nimbakadambāśvatthakapitthādaya ekatarvākāratām ābibhrāṇāḥ pratīyanta
GSP29snyayvpu:2169: tataś cāivaṃ yathā vyutpāditas taṃ prakāraṃ bhūtaḥ prāpto yaḥ śabdaḥ sa evambhūtaḥ;
GSP29snyayvpu:2172: viṣayaśabdena ca viṣayiṇo 'bhidhānāt. ayaṃ hi yasminn arthe śabdo vyutpādyate sa vyutpattinimittam artho yadāiva vivartate tadāiva taṃ śabdaṃ pravartamānam abhipraiti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2173: na sāmānyena. yathodakādyāharaṇavelāyāṃ yoṣidādimastakārūḍho viśiṣṭaceṣṭāvān eva ghaṭo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2176: paṭādivad iti. atītāṃ bhāvinīṃ vā ceṣṭām adhikṛtya sāmānyenāivocyata iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2183: tasmād yatra kṣaṇe vyutpattinimittam avikalam asti tasminn eva so 'rthas tacchabdena vācya ity evambhūtaḥ.
GSP29snyayvpu:2185: taddvārāyātaḥ punar ekadharmaniṣṭhārthasamarthanapravaṇaḥ parāmarśaḥ śeṣadharmasvīkāratiraskāraparihāradvāreṇa vartamāno nayaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2190: tadbalaprabhāvitasattākā hi khalv ete parapravādāḥ. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2192: 'py advaitavādāḥ sāṃkhyadarśanaṃ ca. vyavahāranayānupāti prāyaś cārvākadarśanam.
GSP29snyayvpu:2195: yathā: katham ete 'vadhāraṇadvāreṇa svakam arthaṃ samarthayantas tadviparītaṃ nirākurvāṇā durnayatāṃ pratipadyanta ity,
GSP29snyayvpu:2198: nayati kenacid aṃśena viśiṣṭam arthaṃ prāpayati yo 'bhiprāyaḥ sa nayaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2199: svābhipretadharmāc cheṣadharmapratikṣepadvāreṇa tu pravṛtto na kiñcin nayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:2203: [NAV_29.23] tathā hi: yaḥ tāvan naigamanayaḥ parasparaviśliṣṭau sāmānyaviśeṣau pratyapīpadat,
GSP29snyayvpu:2204: tad ayuktam. tayos tathā kadācana pratibhāsābhāvāt. yac coktam:
GSP29snyayvpu:2205: anuvartamānāikākāraparāmarśagrāhyaṃ sāmānyaṃ yatra na tatra viśeṣapratibhāso,
GSP29snyayvpu:2206: yatra ca viśiṣṭadeśadaśāvacchinnabodhanirgrāhyo viśeṣo na tatra sāmānyāvagatis,
GSP29snyayvpu:2208: dhavakhadirapalāśādisamastaviśeṣāpasāraṇe vṛkṣatvādisāmānyapratibhāsābhāvāt. dūrād viśeṣāgrahaṇe 'pi kevalaṃ tac cakāstīti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2210: tadvirahe śaśaviṣāṇarūpatvāt. evaṃ viśeṣā api na sāmānyād atyantavyatirekiṇaḥ pratibhānti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2212: itarathā sattāto 'tiricyamānā bhāvā niḥsvabhāvatām ātmasātkurvanti. tathā vṛkṣatvādisāmānyebhyo 'pi bhedino vṛkṣādayo na syus,
GSP29snyayvpu:2213: tadabhedanibandhanatvāt tatsvarūpasthiteḥ. tasmāt tad eva saṃvedanam upasarjanīkṛtavaiṣamyaṃ pradhānīkṛtāikākāraṃ sāmānyaṃ gṛhṇātīty ucyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2215: samatvanānātvayoḥ kathañcid bhedābhedinoḥ parasparaṃ sarvārtheṣu bhāvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:2216: tadabhāve tathāvidhapratibhāsānupapatteḥ. etena yad avādi “na cāitau vibhinnāv api pratibhāsamānau sāmānyaviśeṣau kathañcin miśrayituṃ yuktāv”
GSP29snyayvpu:2218: vibhinnayoḥ pratibhāsābhāvāt. vyavahāro 'pi sarvaḥ pradhānopasarjanadvāreṇa kathañcid itaretarāvinirluṭhitasāmānyaviśeṣasādhya eva;
GSP29snyayvpu:2222: gotvaśūnyānāṃ teṣāṃ vṛkṣādyaviśiṣṭatayā tatkaraṇasāmarthyābhāvāt. kiṃ cātyantavyatireke sāmānyaviśeṣayor vṛkṣaṃ chindhīti coditaḥ kim iti tadviśeṣe palāśādauchedaṃ vidhatte?
GSP29snyayvpu:2223: tatra tasya samavāyād iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2226: tasyāpi vyatiriktatayā padārthāntarāviśeṣān nityatvāikatvasarvagatatvādibhiś ca sarvatra tatkaraṇaprasaṅgāc ca. yat punar avādīr,
GSP29snyayvpu:2229: tato viviktayos tayoḥ kvacid anupalambhād yo 'yaṃ vivikteṣu sāmānyeṣu viśeṣeṣu cābhidhānārthakriyālakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ sa samastaḥ pralayaṃ yāyāl,
GSP29snyayvpu:2232: yato yady api parasparāviviktayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ sarvatropalambhas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2233: tathāpi yatrāiva pramātur arthitvaṃ tad eva sāmānyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2234: viśeṣān vā pradhānīkṛtya tadgocaraṃ dhvanim arthakriyāṃ vā pravartayatītarasyāpy upasarjanabhāvena tatra vyāpārāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:2235: tadvikalasyetarasyāpi śaśaviśāṇāyamānatayā kvacid anupayogāt. kiṃ cātyantavyatirekiṇi
GSP29snyayvpu:2237: mūrdhani patad durviṣahaṃ syāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2238: tat teṣu kathaṃ varteta -- sāmastyenāikadeśena vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2241: ekatvābhupagamakṣateḥ. ekadeśena vartane punar yāvanto viśeṣās tāvantas tadaṃśāḥ prasajanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2244: sāvayavatve 'pi punas te 'bhinnā bhinnā vā. yady abhinnā viśeṣās,
GSP29snyayvpu:2246: viśeṣābhāvāt. bhedapakṣe punas teṣv api tat kathaṃ varteta -- sāmastyenāikadeśena veti?
GSP29snyayvpu:2248: tan nātyantabhedino vṛttiḥ sambhavati. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2249: yady ekaṃ sāmānyaṃ bhedavat samastaviśeṣeṣu varteta,
GSP29snyayvpu:2258: sannihitaviśeṣaniṣṭham eva tad upalabhyate. tasyāiva tadvyañjakatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:2259: itareṣāṃ tadabhāvād iti cen nāikasvabhāvasya khaṇḍaśo vyañjanāyogāt sannihitaviśeṣavyañjitam eva tat sarvatra svabhāvāntarābhāvāt sarvaviśeṣagataṃ ca tadrūpam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2260: atas taddarśanaṃ kena vāryeta. atha dvitīyaḥ kalpas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2265: cirantanaviśeṣavyavasthitasattākaṃ tan nūtanaviśeṣotpāde sati kathaṃ tena saha sambandham anubhavet?
GSP29snyayvpu:2266: na tāvad viśeṣāntarebhyas tad utpitsuviśeṣadeśaṃ gantum arhati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2269: viśeṣotpādāt prāk taddeśe tadupalambhābhāvāt. nāpi viśeṣeṇāiva sahotpadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2271: nityasya cotpattivirodhāt. athāitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā tat sakriyākam abhidhīyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:2276: aparāparaviśeṣotpāde 'pi prācīnavyaktiṣu taddarśanāt. atha dvitīyaḥ kalpas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2278: niravayavasya pūrvavyaktityāgavaikalye saty utpitsuvyaktiṃ pratigamanābhāvāt. sāvayavapakṣasya punaḥ prāg evāpāstatvān,
GSP29snyayvpu:2282: tadā sattvasambandhāt prāg bhāvāḥ santo 'santo vā. santaś ced apārthakaḥ sattāsambandho,
GSP29snyayvpu:2284: punaḥsattāntarasambandhānivāraṇāt. asantaś ced atyantāsatām api gaganāravindādīnāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:2288: tan na parasparam atyantavyatirekiṇau sāmānyaviśeṣau kathañcana ghaṭām āṭīkete. ata
GSP29snyayvpu:2289: eva tatsamarthanapravaṇas tattādātmyapratikṣepako 'bhiprāyo nirālambanatvān naigamadurnayavyapadeśam āskandati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2291: vyatirekiṇor api tayor vastuni kathañcid bhāvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:2294: atyantatādātmye tatkāriṇyā vivakṣāyā api nirgocaratāprasaṅgāt. tasmāt kathañcid bhedābhedināv evāitau,
GSP29snyayvpu:2295: tadanyatarasamarthakaḥ punar nirālambanatvād durnayatāṃ svīkarotīti sthitam.
GSP29snyayvpu:2296: [NAV_29.24] tathā saṅgraho 'py aśeṣaviśeṣapratikṣepamukhena sāmānyam ekaṃ samarthayamāno durnayaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2299: yat tāvad uktaṃ -- yad uta “viśeṣāḥ sāmānyād vyatirekiṇo 'vyatirekiṇo vā. vyatirekapakṣe niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2304: viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā. vyatiriktaṃ cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2308: viśeṣāvyatiriktatvād eva tatsvarūpavat. yad apy avādy -- “anādyavidyābalapravṛtto viśeṣavyavahāras,
GSP29snyayvpu:2309: tāttvikaṃ sāmānyaṃ” -- tad api vacanamātram eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:2312: viśeṣāḥ punaḥ pāramārthikā iti viśeṣavādino 'pi vadato vaktrabhaṅgābhāvāt. yat punar viśeṣagrāhakapramāṇābhāvaṃ pratipādayatābhyadhāyi,
GSP29snyayvpu:2313: yad uta “pratyakṣaṃ bhāvasampāditasattākaṃ tam eva sākṣātkaroti nābhāvaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2322: bhāvatādātmyena vyavasthitasyābhāvasya vyāpāre virodhābhāvāt. kathaṃ bhāvābhāvayos tādātmyaṃ, virodhād?
GSP29snyayvpu:2323: iti cen, na, pramāṇaprasiddhe virodhābhāvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2325: na paṭādirūpeṇāpīti bhāvābhāvātmakaḥ. yadi punaḥ kathañcin nābhāvātmakaḥ syāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:2326: tadā paṭādirūpeṇāpi bhāvāt sarvātmakaḥ prāpnoti. yuktam etad,
GSP29snyayvpu:2329: yadi paṭādyabhāvāikāntāc chūnyavādino 'pi manorathapūraṇaṃ na syāt; tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2331: na ca paṭādyabhāvo bhāvena saha tādātmyam anubhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2333: evaṃ paṭādayo 'pītaretarāpekṣayeti śūnyatvāpattiḥ. tasmāt svarūpam ābibhrāṇaṃ pararūpebhyo vyāvṛttam eva vastu sarvakriyāsu vyāpriyata iti bhāvābhāvātmakasyāiva
GSP29snyayvpu:2336: tataś ca tadrūpam eva tat sākṣātkuryād iti svarūpaniyate pararūpebhyo vyāvṛtta eva vastuni pratyakṣaṃ pravartate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2339: tasya kevalasya svarūpāvyavasthiter utpādakatvāyogāt. na ca janakatvād artho grāhyo janyatvād vā jñānaṃ grāhakam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2341: kiṃ tarhy āvaraṇavicchedāder labdhasattākaṃ grahaṇapariṇāmāj jñānaṃ gṛhṇāty,
GSP29snyayvpu:2343: sa cānuvartamānavyāvartamānarūpa eva pratīyata iti tathābhūto 'bhyupagantavyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:2344: na kevalasāmānyarūpa iti. sadasadaṃśayoḥ katham ekatrāvasthānam iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2345: tādātmyeneti brūmaḥ. nanu tādātmye bhāvamātram abhāvamātraṃ vāpadyetetaretarāvyavatiriktatvād,
GSP29snyayvpu:2356: pararūpeṇa tv abhāvād iti. tad evaṃ pratyakṣe viviktavastugrāhiṇi sakalapramāṇapraṣṭhe
GSP29snyayvpu:2357: prasādhite śeṣapramāṇāny api tadanusāritayā viviktam eva svagocaraṃ sthāpayantīti.
GSP29snyayvpu:2360: [NAV_29.25] tathā vyavahāro 'pi pramāṇaprasiddhaṃ vastusvarūpaṃ nihnuvāno yuktiriktam avicāritaramaṇīyaṃ lokavyavahāramārgānusāri samarthayamāno durnayatām ātmani nidhatte,
GSP29snyayvpu:2362: yad idaṃ kiyatkālabhāvi sthūratām ābibhrāṇaṃ lokavyavahārakāri ghaṭādikaṃ bhavatas tāttvikam abhipretaṃ tan nākasmikaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2364: itarathā niṣkāraṇatvena sarvadā bhāvābhāvaprasaṅgāt. na te paramāṇavas tathā pratibhāntīti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2365: nāta eva teṣām anumānataḥ siddhiḥ. yadi punar yad eva sākṣān na viśadadarśane cakāsti tat sakalam apalapyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:2372: yathā bāhyatvaṅmātrapratibhāse 'pi sarvavastūnāṃ tāvatā vyavahārābhāvān madhyabhāgādisādhanena sampūrṇāni tatsamarthāni tāni sādhyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:2376: tatra cokto doṣaḥ. tadutpādakānantaraparyāyeṣṭau punas tajjanakaparyāyo 'py abhyupagantavya
GSP29snyayvpu:2377: ity anādiparyāyaparamparā siddhim adhyāsīta. tathā vyavahārāvatārivastuparyantaparyāyasya
GSP29snyayvpu:2379: bhavannīter evārthakriyākaraṇavaikalyāt. tadutpādakatve punar asāv apy aparaparyāyotpādaka
GSP29snyayvpu:2380: ity anantaparyāyamālopapadyate. tathā ghanākāro 'pi viśadadarśanena sākṣātkriyamāṇo
GSP29snyayvpu:2383: tadavayavānām apy avayavāntaraghaṭitatvāt. paramāṇava eva paryantāvayavāḥ paramārthato ghanākārahetavas;
GSP29snyayvpu:2387: lokavyavahārāvatāriṇaḥ pramāṇam anugrāhakam asti vastuno netarasyetyādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:2393: sarvasya sarvalokānupayogitvāt. kasyacid upayogitayā vastutve teṣām api sā samasty eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:2394: sarvajñajñānādigocaratvād ity āstāṃ tāvat. tad evaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhārthāpalāpitvād vyavahāro durnayaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2396: [NAV_29.26] atha ṛjusūtro 'pi dṛṣṭāpalāpenādṛṣṭam eva kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇulakṣaṇaṃ vastusvarūpaṃ paramārthatayā manyamāno durnayatām āskandati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2398: svāvayavavyāpinaṃ kālāntarasaṃcariṣṇum ākāraṃ sākṣāl lakṣayan paścāt kuyuktivikalpena vivecayed,
GSP29snyayvpu:2399: yad utāiṣa sthirasthūro dṛśyamānaḥ khalv ākāro na ghaṭām iyarti. vicārākṣamatvād ityādinā na ca dṛṣṭam adṛṣṭasandarśakaiḥ kuyuktivikalpair bādhituṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:2401: “mandamandaprakāśe pradeśe rajjau viṣadharabhrāntiḥ prāktanī yathodīcīnena tannirṇayakāriṇā vikalpena bādhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2406: tadabhāve ca vikalpaśatair api nivartayitum aśakyatvāt. atrāpy atītavartsyator vinaṣṭānutpannatayāsannihitatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:2407: sthūrāvayavānāṃ ca svāvayaveṣu bhedābhedadvāreṇa paryālocyamānānām avasthānābhāvāt kṣaṇakṣayiparamāṇava eva pratibhānti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2408: tataś ca pratibhāsa eva sthirasthūradarśanasya bādhaka iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:2410: tathāiva vyavahāraḥ pravarteta. pāścātyamithyāvikalpaviplavān na pravartata iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2413: pāścātyamithyāvikalpaviplavāt tu dhavalaḥ pratibhātīti bhavannyāyena śaṭhaḥ pratijānānaḥ kena vāryeta. tan na dṛṣṭāpalāpaḥ kartuṃ śakya iti
GSP29snyayvpu:2416: tadaniṣṭau tasyāpy asiddheḥ. etena sthirasthūravastuno 'rthakriyāvirahapratipādanam api prativyūḍhaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2419: “kṣaṇabhaṅguro hy arthātmā svakṣane pūrvaṃ paścād vā kāryaṃ kuryād ityādi. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2420: sattvapuruṣatvacaitanyādibhir bālakumārayuvasthaviratvaharṣaviṣādādibhiś cānuvartamānavyāvartamānarūpasya sarvasya vastunaḥ pratīter dravyaparyāyātmakatvam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2422: bhedasya paryāyarūpatvād iti. tataś ca bhūtabhāvikṣaṇayor asannidhānadvāreṇa vārtamānikakṣaṇasyāivārthakriyākāritvapratipādanaṃ nāsmādbādhākaraṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2423: paryāyāṇāṃ kramabhāvitayā vartamānaparyāyāliṅgitasyāiva dravyasyārthakriyākaraṇacaturatvāt. [na] kevalaṃ tat trikālavyāpi,
GSP29snyayvpu:2424: draṣṭāpi dravyarūpatayā tathābhūta eva. tataś ca kṣaṇikaparyāyatirodhānadvāreṇa tadrūpasaṅkalanāt sthiram evedaṃ samastakriyāsu vyāpriyata iti pratītivīthim avatarati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2427: prākṛtalokajñānasyāvaraṇakṣayopaśamāpekṣitayā katicidaṃśaviṣayatvāt. yadi punar dravyabuddhiḥ paryāyaparamparādarśanabalāyātatvād atāttvikī
GSP29snyayvpu:2428: tadā pūrvaparyāyasyottaraparyāyotpādane sānvayatvaṃ niranvayatvaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2430: niranvayatve punar nirhetutayottaraparyāyānutpādaprasaṅgaḥ. tan nobhayarūpavastuvyatirekeṇārthakriyāsiddhiḥ. na cārthakriyā vastulakṣaṇaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2433: evaṃ yāvat sarvakṣaṇānāṃ saṅkalikayā vastutvam. atha kṣaṇāntarānārambhe 'pi svagocarajñānajanakatvam arthakriyā parikalpyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:2434: tathā saty atītabhāviparyāyaparamparāpi yogijñānagocaratāṃ yātīti vastutvaṃ svīkuryāt. tan nārthakriyā vastulakṣaṇam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2436: pramāṇapratiṣṭhitatvāt. utpādavyayau dhrauvyena saha viruddhāv iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2440: sarvapramāṇānāṃ bahir antaś ca tathāvidhāvastudyotanapaṭiṣṭhatayā prasādhitatvāt. nāpi dvitīyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:2443: tadapahnavena virodhodbhāvanasya nirmūlatayā pralāpamātratvāt. yat punar vartamānaprakāśarūpatayā tatsambaddhavastugrāhitvaṃ sarvapramāṇānām
GSP29snyayvpu:2448: tadrūpatayā teṣām apy avasthānāt. tataś cātmano 'rthagrahaṇapariṇāmarūpatvāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:2453: grāhyāder bahiraṅgatvāt. sāmastyena punar āvaraṇavilaye sati samastavastuvistārānādyanantakṣaṇaparamparāgrahaṇaprasaṅgo
GSP29snyayvpu:2454: na no bādhākārīṣṭatvāt. tad ekadeśakṣayopaśame punas tadanusāriṇī bodhapravṛttir
GSP29snyayvpu:2457: na sampūrṇe. na ca tāny alīkāni,
GSP29snyayvpu:2464: tadabhāve tadutpādyābhimatabhrānter nirbījatayotpatter asambhavāt. tathā sthiratāropo 'pi kvacid gṛhītasthiratvasyāiva yukto nānyathā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2465: yathā dṛṣṭaviṣadharasya mandaprakāśe rajjudarśane viṣadharāropaḥ. na ca bhavatāṃ kadācana sthiratā pratītigocaracāritām anubhavati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2466: tat kathaṃ pratikṣaṇam udayāpavargasaṃsargiṇi sakale vastuni pratyakṣeṇāvalokite
GSP29snyayvpu:2467: 'pi tadāropa iti. tasmāt tirohitakṣaṇavivartam alakṣitaparamāṇuvaiviktyaṃ vastu sarvasāṃvyavahārikapramāṇair
GSP29snyayvpu:2471: [NAV_29.27] tathā śabdādayo 'pi sarvathā śabdāvyatirekam arthasya samarthayanto durnayās,
GSP29snyayvpu:2472: tatsamarthanārtham upanyastasya tatpratītau pratīyamānatvalakṣaṇasya hetor anaikāntikatvāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2473: nāyam ekānto yatpratītau yat pratīyate tat tato 'vyatiriktam eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:2474: vyatiriktasyāpi pāvakāder anyathānupapannatvalakṣaṇasambandhabalād dhūmādipratītau pratīyamānatvāt. evaṃ śabdo 'pi vyatiriktam apy arthaṃ vācakatvāt
GSP29snyayvpu:2476: chabdād vivekenāivānubhūyamānatvāt. asmiṃś ca hetāv anaikāntike sthite sarvārthānāṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:2477: sasvavācakatvasādhanadvāreṇa śabdāvyatirekasādhanam api dūrāpāstam eva. na cātrāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:2478: pratibandhagrāhi pramāṇaṃ -- yo yo 'rthas tena tena sasvavācakena bhavitavyaṃ --
GSP29snyayvpu:2481: ca. kṣaṇabhaṅguratāpratijñānaṃ punar amīṣāṃ apy ṛjusūtravan nirasitavyam. tathā pratyekamatāpekṣayāpi
GSP29snyayvpu:2482: svābhipretaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantas tadviparītaṃ śabdārthaṃ tiraskurvāṇā durnayatām ātmasātkurvanti.
GSP29snyayvpu:2484: yad uta vidhimukhena śabdo 'rthasya vācaka iti;
GSP29snyayvpu:2485: na punar ayaṃ niyamo yathāyam asyāiva vācako nānyasya,
GSP29snyayvpu:2489: tadaniṣṭau tallopaprasaṅgāt. tasmāt sarvadhvanayo yogyatayā sarvārthavācakā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2490: deśakṣayopaśamādyapekṣayā tu kvacit kathañcit pratītiṃ janayanti. tataś ca kvacid anapekṣitavyutpattinimittā rūḍhitaḥ pravartante,
GSP29snyayvpu:2492: kvacit tatkālavartivyutpattinimittāpekṣayeti na tatra prāmāṇikena niyatārthāgraho vidheyaḥ. ato 'mī śabdādayo yadetaretarābhimataśabdārthopekṣayā svābhimataṃ śabdārthaṃ darśayanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2494: tasyāpi tatra bhāvāt. parasparabādhayā pravartamānāḥ punar durnayarūpatāṃ bhajanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2497: tadā vacanam apy ekadharmakathanadvāreṇa pravartamānaṃ sāvadhāraṇatvāc ca śeṣadharmapratikṣepakāry
GSP29snyayvpu:2498: alīkamāpadyate. tataś cānantadharmādhyāsitavastusandarśakam eva vacanaṃ yathāvasthitārthapratipādakatvāt satyaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:2500: ghaṭo 'yaṃ śuklo mūrta ityādy ekāikadharmapratipādananiṣṭhatayā vyavahāre śabdaprayogadarśanāt,
GSP29snyayvpu:2502: tadabhidhāyakānām apyānantyāt. na cāikāikadharmasandarśakatve 'py amūni vacanāny alīkāni vaktuṃ pāryante,
GSP29snyayvpu:2504: tadalīkatve tataḥ pravṛttyasiddher iti. atrocyata -- iha tāvad dvaye vastupratipādakā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2505: laukikās tattvacintakāś ca. tatra pratyakṣādiprasiddham artham arthitvavaśāl laukikās tāvan madhyasthabhāvena vyavahārakāle vyapadiśyanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2506: yad uta nīlam utpalaṃ sugandhi komalam iti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2509: tāvatāiva vivakṣitavyavahāraparisamāpteḥ. na ca tadvacanānām alīkatā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2511: tatpratikṣepakāriṇām evālīkatvāt. “sarvaṃ vacanaṃ sāvadhāraṇam” itinyāyāt teṣām api śeṣadharmatiraskārakāritvasiddher bhavannītyālīkatāpadyata iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2513: yathānekapuruṣasampūrṇe sadasi dvārādau sthitasya kim atra devadattaḥ samasti nāstīti
GSP29snyayvpu:2514: vā dolāyamānabuddheḥ kenacid abhidhīyate -- yathā devadatto 'stīti. atra yady apy
GSP29snyayvpu:2522: tadabhāve prayoktrabhiprāyamātreṇa rūpasyāiva niyoktum aśakyatvāt. na ca samastadharmayuktam eva vastu pratipādayad vacanaṃ satyam ity abhidadhmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2526: tasmāt tatpratipādakaṃ satyam eva. yadā tu durnayamatābhiniviṣṭabuddhibhis tīrthāntarīyais taddharmigatadharmāntaranirākaraṇābhiprāyeṇāiva sāvadhāraṇaṃ tat prayujyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2527: yathānityam eva vastu nityam eva vetyādi,
GSP29snyayvpu:2528: tadā nirālambanatvād alīkatāṃ prāpnuvat kena vāryeta?
GSP29snyayvpu:2529: tattvacintakāḥ punaḥ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddham anekāntātmakaṃ vastu darśayanto dvedhā darśayeyus,
GSP29snyayvpu:2530: tad yathā -- vikalādeśena sakalādeśena vā. tatra vikālādeśo nayādhīnaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2532: yadā madhyasthabhāvenārthitvavaśāt kiñcid dharmaṃ pratipipādayiṣavaḥ śeṣadharmasvīkaraṇanirākaraṇavimukhayā dhiyā vācaṃ prayuñjate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2534: yad uta “jīvo 'sti kartā pramātā bhoktetyādi“. ataḥ sampūrṇavastupratipādanābhāvād vikalādeśo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2535: nayamatena sambhavaddharmāṇāṃ darśanamātram ity arthaḥ. yadā tu pramāṇavyāpāram avikalaṃ parāmṛśya pratipādayitum abhiprayanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2543: sakalagrāhi tu mānaṃ vikalagrāhī nayo jñeyaḥ //
GSP29snyayvpu:2545: nayapramāṇābhijñaḥ syādvādī sakalavikalādeśāv adhikṛtya vastusvarūpapratipipādayiṣayā yad yad brūte tat tat satyaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2546: sambhavadarthagocaratvāt. durnayamatāvalambinaḥ punar ekāntavādino yad yad ācakṣate tat tad alīkam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2548: [NAV_30.0] sāmpratam amum evārthaṃ draḍhayan siddhānte 'py ekāikanayamatapravṛttāni sūtrāṇi na sampūrṇārthābhidhāyakānīty,
GSP29snyayvpu:2549: api tu tatsamudāyābhiprāyapravṛttam avikalavastunivedakam iti darśayann āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2553: tad yathā -- mithyāśrutaṃ nayaśrutaṃ syādvādaśrutaṃ ca. tatra śrūyata iti śrutam āgamaḥ. mithyālīkaṃ śrutaṃ mithyāśrutaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2555: nirgocaratvāt. tathā nayair hetubhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ nayaśrutam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2558: ṛjusūtranayābhiprāyeṇa kṣaṇikatvasyāpi tatra sambhavāt. tathā nirdiśyamānadharmavyatiriktāśeṣadharmāntarasaṃsūcakena syātā yukto vādo 'bhipretadharmavacanaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:2559: tadātmakaṃ śrutaṃ syādvādaśrutam. tat kiṃbhūtam ucyata ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2560: sampūrṇo 'vikalaḥ sa cāsāv arthaś ca tadviniścāyi tannirṇayahetutvād evam abhidhīyate;
GSP29snyayvpu:2563: niścayasya bodharūpatvād iti. nayaśrutaṃ tarhi sampūrṇārthaviniścāyi kasmān na bhavatīty āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2564: nayānāṃ naigamādīnām ekaniṣṭḥānām ekadharmagrahaṇaparyavasitānāṃ śrutavartmany āgamamārge pravṛtteḥ pravartanān na tad ekāikābhiprāyapratibaddhaṃ
GSP29snyayvpu:2566: [NAV_31.0] tad evaṃ nayapramāṇasvarūpaṃ pratipādyādhunāśeṣanayapramāṇavyāpakaṃ teṣāṃ tatra tādātmyenāvasthānāt pramātāram abhidhātukāma āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2571: sa pramiṇotīti pramātā prameyaparicchedakaḥ. kiṃbhūtaḥ sann ity āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2572: svānyāv ātmaparau nirbhāsitum uddyotayituṃ śīlam asyeti svānyanirbhāsī,
GSP29snyayvpu:2573: svasvarūpārthayoḥ prakāśaka iti yāvat. tathā karotīti kartā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2576: sā vidyate yasyeti vivṛttimān. sva ātmā saṃvedyate 'neneti svasaṃvedanaṃ tena samyak
GSP29snyayvpu:2577: siddhaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ pratīto vā svasaṃvedanasaṃsiddhaḥ. kṣitiḥ pṛthivy ādir yeṣāṃ tāni kṣityādīny,
GSP29snyayvpu:2579: na vidyata ātmā svarūpam asyety anātmakaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2583: [NAV_31.2] tatra jīvaḥ pramātetyanena ye pāramārthikaṃ pramātāraṃ nābhyupagacchanty,
GSP29snyayvpu:2584: api tu vijñānakṣaṇaparamparānubhavabalaprabodhitānādiprarūḍhavāsanāsampāditasattākaṃ mithyāvikalpaparikalpitam apāramārthikaṃ taṃ manyante pratikṣaṇavilayavādinaḥ tān nirācaṣṭe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2587: [NAV_31.3] nanu ca ghaṭādayas tāvad vināśam āviśanto dṛśyante,
GSP29snyayvpu:2589: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ vā. yady ādyaḥ kalpas tad ayuktaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2592: anyathā svabhāvatvāyogāt. athāivaṃbhūta eva tasya svabhāvaḥ svakāraṇabalāyāto yad uta vināśakāraṇam āsādya vinaṅkṣyatīti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2593: tathāpi tadvināśakāraṇasannidhānaṃ kiṃ yādṛcchikam uta tatsvabhāvasampādyam eva. yadādyaḥ kalpas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2598: tataś cāsannihitasvavināśakāraṇakadambakaḥ kaścid ghaṭādir na vinaśyed apy,
GSP29snyayvpu:2601: tathā sati paścād api tadbalād vināśahetavaḥ sannidhāsyantīti prathamakṣaṇa eva sannidadhatu,
GSP29snyayvpu:2602: tathāpi kṣaṇikatāivārthasya. svahetor eva niyatakālāt parato 'yaṃ svavināśahetuṃ sannidhāpayiṣyatīty evaṃrūpo jāta iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2604: svahetunā kilāsau varṣāt parataḥ svavināśahetusannidhāpanakṣamasvabhāvo vyadhāyi;
GSP29snyayvpu:2605: sa ca tasyotpādakṣaṇād dvitīyakṣaṇe svabhāvo 'sti vā na vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2606: asti cet, tathā sati punar varṣaṃ tena sthātavyam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2607: evaṃ yāvad varṣopāntyakṣaṇe 'pi yadi tatsvabhāva evāsau tadāparam api varṣāntaraṃ sthitir āpadyeta,
GSP29snyayvpu:2609: apracyutavarṣasthāyisvabhāvatvād iti. atha dvitīyakṣaṇe nāsti sa svabhāva iti brūṣe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2612: vināśahetur bhāvasya vināśaṃ vyatiriktam avyatiriktaṃ vā kuryāt?
GSP29snyayvpu:2614: tataś ca bhāvas tādavasthyam anubhavet. tatsambandhaḥ kriyata iti cen,
GSP29snyayvpu:2615: na sambandhasya tādātmyatadutpattivyatiriktasya pratiṣedhāt. na cānayor anyataraḥ sambandho 'tra samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2617: anyahetukasya paścād utpannasya tadutpattivaikalyāt. tan na vyatirikto vināśaḥ kartuṃ yuktaḥ. avyatiriktakaraṇe punas tam eva bhāvaṃ vināśahetuḥ karotīti prāptam,
GSP29snyayvpu:2621: na pralayaḥ. tan nāvinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ paścāt kathañcid api vināśaḥ kartuṃ śakyo,
GSP29snyayvpu:2622: vinaśvarasvabhāvānāṃ punaḥ svahetubalāyātatvāt prāg api pratikṣaṇabhāvī,
GSP29snyayvpu:2627: kiṃ tu yathā vināśakāraṇāyogāt pratikṣaṇabhāvī vināśo bhavadbhiḥ pratipadyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2628: tathāiva sthityutpattī pratikṣaṇabhāvinyau kiṃ na pratipadyete,
GSP29snyayvpu:2629: taddhetūnām api vicāryamāṇānām ayogāt. tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2630: sthitihetunā tāvat svayam asthirasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ sthāpyeran sthirasvabhāvā vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2631: na tāvat prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣodaṃ kṣamate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2635: anyathā svabhāvatāhāneḥ. dvitīyapakṣe punaḥ svayaṃ sthirasvabhāvānāṃ kiṃ sthitihetunā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2639: evaṃ hi bhāvāḥ kṣaṇamātram api na tiṣṭheyuḥ. kṣaṇabhāvinīṣyata eveti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2640: sā tarhy asthitisvabhāvānāṃ hetuśatair api kartuṃ na pāryata iti brūmaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2641: tatsvabhāvatve punar hetuvyāpāranairarthakyāt. ahetukā satī sakalakālaṃ bhavatīti
GSP29snyayvpu:2642: datto jalāñjaliḥ pratikṣaṇavilayasya. tathotpādahetur api tatsvabhāvasyotpattiṃ vidadhyād atatsvabhāvasya vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2643: na tāvad ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ kakṣīkartuṃ yuktaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2644: svayam utpādakasyotpādane vyāpriyamāṇo hi hetuḥ piṣṭaṃ pinaṣṭi,
GSP29snyayvpu:2650: tataś ca na kaścid atyantābhāvaḥ syāt. tad yathā nirhetukatvān nāśaḥ pratikṣaṇabhāvī,
GSP29snyayvpu:2651: tathāiva darśitayukteḥ sthityutpattī apīti trayākrāntaṃ sakalaṃ vastu jātam abhyupagantavyaṃ;
GSP29snyayvpu:2652: tathā sati jīvo 'pi jīvatvacaitanyadravyatvādibhiḥ sthemānaṃ ābibhrāṇa eva harṣaviṣādādibhir
GSP29snyayvpu:2653: aparāparārthagrahaṇapariṇāmaiś cotpādavyayadharmakaḥ pāramārthikaḥ pramāteti balāt siddhim adhyāste.
GSP29snyayvpu:2654: [NAV_31.5] nanu ca yady utpādavyayasthitīnāṃ nirhetukatvāt sakalakālabhāvitā bhavadbhiḥ sādhyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2655: tadānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhaḥ khalv ayaṃ tatkāraṇakalāpavyāpāraḥ kathaṃ neyaḥ?
GSP29snyayvpu:2658: tadabhāve ca nopalambhyanta iti tajjanyā ity ucyante. sthitir api vināśakāraṇasannidhānāt prāk tadbalād eva,
GSP29snyayvpu:2659: tathā nāśo 'pi mudgarādisannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ sadasattām anubhavaṃs tatkṛtaḥ pratīyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2661: [NAV_31.6] atrocyate -- na vayaṃ sarvathā hetūnāṃ vyāpāraṃ vārayāmaḥ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2662: kiṃ tarhi svayam utpādavyayasthityātmanā vivartamānasya dravyasya hetavas tadviśeṣakaraṇe vyāpāram anubhavanti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2666: kevalaṃ pratītivikalāṃ yuktiṃ yuktivinākṛtāṃ vā pratītiṃ nāṅgīkurmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2668: [NAV_31.7] svānyanirbhāsītyanena prāguktasvaparābhāsipramāṇaviśeṣaṇavan mīmāṃsakān parokṣabuddhivādino yogācārāṃś ca jñānamātravādinaḥ pratikṣipati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2674: raktatādivyapadeśavad akartur api prakṛtyupadhānavaśāt sukhaduḥkhādibhogavyapadeśo yuktas; tathā hi:
GSP29snyayvpu:2675: prakṛtivikāradarpaṇākārabuddhisaṅkrāntānāṃ sukhaduḥkhādyātmakānām arthānāṃ puruṣaḥ sannidhānamātreṇa bhojako vyapadiśyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2676: “buddhyadhyavasitam arthaṃ puruṣaś cetayata” itivacanād iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2680: sphaṭikadṛṣṭānte 'pi japākusumādisannidhānād andhopalādau raktatānāvirbhavantī tatra punar āvirbhavantī tasya tathāvidhaṃ pariṇāmaṃ lakṣayaty,
GSP29snyayvpu:2681: anyathāndhopalavat tatrāpi na prāduḥṣyāt. tan nākriyasya bhoktṛtopapadyata iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:2682: [NAV_31.9] vivṛttimān ityamunā tv ekāntanityam apariṇāminaṃ naiyāyikavaiśeṣikādiprakalpitaṃ pramātāraṃ nirasyati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2686: anyatrānyathānupapannatvāt. na ca vyatirekiṇi jñāne tat samasti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2690: tadātmanāṃ samavāyasya ca vibhutvād ekarūpatvāc ca sarvātmasu kiṃ na samavaiti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2692: tathā ca devadattajṭānena yajṭadattādayo 'py arthatattvaṃ buddhyeran. anyac ca vijṭānodayasamaye
GSP29snyayvpu:2693: 'pi yādṛśaḥ prāgavasthāyāṃ tādṛśa eva santiṣṭhamānaḥ prāg apramātā paścāt pramāteti
GSP29snyayvpu:2696: [NAV_31.10] paścārddhena punar bhūtavyatirekiṇaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣanirgrāhyaṃ jīvaṃ darśayaṃś cārvākadarśanaṃ tiraskurute,
GSP29snyayvpu:2697: jaḍātmakabhūtāvyatireke hi tadvilakṣaṇabodharūpaharṣaviṣādādivivartānubhavābhāvaprasaṅgāt. nanu ca kāyākārapariṇatāni bhūtāny evātmavyatirekiṇīṃ cetanām utkālayanti;
GSP29snyayvpu:2699: tadabhāve punas teṣv eva nilīyata iti;
GSP29snyayvpu:2702: dvayaṃ hi tāvad etat saṃyogam anubhavad upalababhyate -- paṭcabhūtātmakaṃ śarīraṃ cetanā ca. tatrāpi śarīraṃ bahirmukhākāreṇa bodhenārtharūpatayā jaḍam anubhūyate,
GSP29snyayvpu:2704: 'ta evāvyatirekapakṣaḥ pratibhāsanirākṛtatvān nāśaṅkitaḥ. vyatirekiṇoḥ punaḥ prakāśamānayor yadi bhūtāny eva cetanām utkālayantīti bhavadbhiḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:2705: tadā cetanāiva bhavāntarād utpattisthānamāyātā paṭcabhūtabhrāntijanakaṃ śarīraṃ nirvartayet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2708: tadviyuktaṃ punaḥ kāṣṭhavat tiṣṭhed iti jīvasampādyam eva śarīraṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2711: jīvasya cetanāvataḥ sakarmakatayāparāparabhavabhramaṇāparāparaśarīranirvartanayor upapadyamānatvāt. bhavāntarād āgacchan utpattisthānaṃ jīvo 'dhyakṣeṇa nopalabhyata iti ced,
GSP29snyayvpu:2712: bhūtāny api tarhi kāyākāradhāraṇadvāreṇa cetanām utkālayantīti pratyakṣeṇa nopalakṣyanta iti samāno nyāhaḥ. atha kāyākārapariṇateṣv eva bhūteṣu
GSP29snyayvpu:2714: evaṃ tarhi mṛtāvasthāyāṃ kāyākāram ābibhrāṇeṣv api nopalabdhā,
GSP29snyayvpu:2715: kāyākārapariṇāmo vā kādācitkatayā hetvantarāpekṣītyanyathānupapattivaśād eva tannirvartanakṣamā cetanā bhavāntarāgatajīvasambandhinīti pratipadyāmahe. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2716: jīvas tāvat karmacaitanyasambandhāc charīranirvartanārthaṃ pravarata iti yuktam evāitad,
GSP29snyayvpu:2721: tac caitanyaṃ tebhyo bhinnam abhinnam vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2723: tadā puruṣaśarīravat tatrāpi bhūtaiḥ saha vartamānam api bhūtavilakṣaṇam ātmakāraṇam anumāpayatīti tadavasthāiva jīvasiddhiḥ. athābhinnaṃ,
GSP29snyayvpu:2726: tatsvarūpavat. nijanijacaitanyāvyatirekīṇi bhūtāni tenāyam adoṣa iti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2727: tatsampādyapuruṣaśarīre 'pi tajjanyapañcacaitanyaprasaṅgāt. pañcāpi sambhūya bṛhatpuruṣacaitanyaṃ bahavas tilā iva tailaghaṭaṃ janayantīti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2728: tat tarhi puruṣacaitanyaṃ kiṃ teṣām eva saṃyogo yad vā tadutpādyam, anyad eva?
GSP29snyayvpu:2732: itarathā bahupuruṣacaitanyāni sambhūya bṛhattamacaitanyāntaram ārabheran. atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣas,
GSP29snyayvpu:2733: tatrāpi teṣāṃ kim anvayo 'sti nāsti vā?
GSP29snyayvpu:2737: niranvayotpādasya pramāṇabādhitatvāt. tan na sacetanāni bhūtāni cetanākaraṇe vyāpārabhāñji bhavitum arhanti. nāpi niścetanāni,
GSP29snyayvpu:2739: itarathā sikatādayas tailādikaraṇe vyāpriyeran. kiṃ ca,
GSP29snyayvpu:2740: tatsamudāyamātrasādhyaṃ vā caitanyaṃ syād viśiṣṭatatpariṇāmasādhyaṃ vā. na tāvad ādyā kḷptir,
GSP29snyayvpu:2741: ilājalānalānilanabhastalamīlane 'pi cetanānupalabdheḥ. dvitīyavikḷptau punaḥ kiṃ tad vaiśiṣṭyam iti vācyam. kāyākārapariṇāma iti cet,
GSP29snyayvpu:2742: sa tarhi sarvadā kasmān na bhavati?
GSP29snyayvpu:2744: tat tarhi hetvantaraṃ bhavāntarāyātajīvacaitanyam ity anumimīmahe,
GSP29snyayvpu:2748: api tu sa eva tajjanya iti yuktaṃ paśyāmaḥ. na pratyakṣād anyat pramāṇam asti,
GSP29snyayvpu:2750: tena dṛṣṭāny eva bhūtāni tatkāraṇatayā kalpanīyānīti cen, na,
GSP29snyayvpu:2752: tathā ca bhūyāṃsy anumānāni paralokānuyāyijīvasādhakāni pravarteran. tad yathā -- tadaharjātabālakasyādyastanābhilāṣaḥ pūrvābhilāṣapūrvako,
GSP29snyayvpu:2755: tad idam anumānam ādyastanābhilāṣasyābhilāṣāntarapūrvakatvam anumāpayad arthāpattyā paralokayāyijīvamākṣipati,
GSP29snyayvpu:2756: tajjanmany abhilāṣāntarābhāvāt. evam anyad apy udāhāryam ity āstāṃ tāvat.
GSP29snyayvpu:2757: [NAV_31.11] tad ayaṃ svaparaprakāśakaḥ kartā bhoktā nityānityātmako bhūtavilakṣaṇaḥ
GSP29snyayvpu:2766: seyam anantaroktasthityā prakīrtiteti saṃsargaḥ. kiṃbhūtety āha:
GSP29snyayvpu:2769: na vidyete ādinidhane yasyāsau tathāvidha ātmā svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ sānādinidhanātmikā;
GSP29snyayvpu:2772: taducchede ca vicārānutthāne na kasyacit tattvasya pratiṣṭhitiḥ. prakīrtitā saṃśabditāvyutpannavipratipannavyāmohāpohāyeti gamyate;
GSP29snyayvpu:2774: tadapanodārthaṃ ca sati sāmarthye karuṇāvatāṃ pravṛtter iti.
GSP29snyayvpu:2776: hetur nayāśritakutīrthimṛgān ananyatrāṇān vihāya jinam eti tam āśrayadhvaṃ // NAV_32.1:1 //
GSP29snyayvpu:2777: bhaktir mayā bhagavati prakaṭīkṛteyaṃ tacchāsanāṃśakathanān na matiḥ svakīyā /
GSP29snyayvpu:2778: mohād ato yad iha kiñcid abhūd asādhu tat sādhavaḥ kṛtakṛpā mayi śodhayantu // NAV_32.1:2 //
GSP29snyayvpu:2779: nyāyāvatāravivṛtiṃ vividhāṃ vidhitsoḥ siddhaḥ śubho ya iha puṇyacayas tato me /
GSP29snyayvpu:2780: nityaṃ parārthakaraṇodyatam ā bhavāntād bhūyāj jinendramatalampaṭam eva cetaḥ // NAV_32.1:3 //
